title: BHT - Transactions page - Enhance UI to display the transaction of donating
description: As a BHT consumer, I want to have the transactions page, so that I can view and keep track my transactions history.+*AC:*+After login to BHT web, I click my avatar to open the user profile pop-up.Below Account I can see a new item named Transactions, on clicking I can open the Transaction History page:For each transaction I can see:* Transaction Date: sample format Apr 8th, 2021 11:25 AM* Transaction Type: *Cause2Fund** Amount: {color:#ff5630}*-*{color}{color:#ff5630}${color}{color:#ff5630}*<amount>*{color} (Ex: - $5,000.00)* Status: *Pending* / *Completed / Rejected*I can click on each row of transaction to open the transaction details page: the UI and data displayed this page should be as same as GreenCom web (with black background):!image-20210409-075601.png|width=1636,height=879!I can filter the transaction by date range, status.

title: [Web] ARM - Stripe account configuration page

title: Admin - Record transaction after donating with bank account
description: As a system admin or a tenant admin of PathoCare / BHT, I want to be able to view the donate transaction after donating with bank account.+*AC:*+*_Transaction List_*For each donate transaction, I can see info below:* Transaction ID* Category: Cause2Fund* Status: Pending / Completed / Rejected* Beneficiary: \[*Business Name]* (the owner name of the program to which the project belongs)* Beneficiary Kard: *xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of Kash Kard)* Remitter:** Guest: displaying Anonymous** Logged user: displaying User name (from Account Information page of web app)* Remitter Kard: not available (displaying “-”)* Transaction Amount: displaying the donate amount, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $2.400.00)* Transaction Date: displaying the donate date, sample format: *Apr 05, 2021, 10:55** Location: not available (displaying “-”)* Channel Name: not available (displaying “-”)* Action: View Detail, I can click to open the transaction details dialog (or click transaction ID).*_Transaction Details_** Transaction ID* Transaction Category: *Cause2Fund** Status: *Completed** Beneficiary: \[*Business Name]* (the owner name of the program to which the project belongs)* Beneficiary Kard: *Kash Kard - *xxxx* (xxxx: the last four digits of merchant KK)* Remitter: ** Guest: displaying Anonymous** Logged user: displaying User name (from Account Information page of web app)* Remitter Kard: not available (displaying “-”)* Staff Name: displaying nothing* Staff ID: displaying nothing* Terminal ID: displaying nothing* Transaction Amount: displaying the donate amount, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $2.400.00)* Fee: displaying the fee (not including VAT), format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $10.00)* Fee VAT: displaying the VAT amount of fee, format: *$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: $10.00)* Transaction Date: displaying the donate date, sample format: *Apr 05, 2021, 10:55** Location: displaying nothing* Auth Code: displaying nothing* Channel Name: displaying nothing

title: PathoCare / BHT - Remind email for user to settle the pending transaction (donating by bank account via Wire Transfer)
description: As a consumer, I want to be reminded to settle the pending transaction.+*AC:*+After finishing donating 24 hours, user will be reminded through the email.This remind email will be sent to user only {color:#ff5630}*once*{color}.Email content:* Subject: *PathoCare / Black Health Trust - Remind for Pending transaction** Content:||*Users*||*Guests*|||*_“Dear \[Customer Name],_**_A transaction of donating $<amount> with your bank account via Wire Transfer is pending for your confirmation._**_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_**_Sincerely,_**_\[Tenant Name] Team_**_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|*_“Hello,_**_A transaction of donating $<amount> with your bank account via Wire Transfer is pending for your confirmation._**_Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxx_**_Sincerely,_**_\[Tenant Name] Team_**_\[Tenant Signature]“_*|* Template:!Screenshot_1.jpg|width=702,height=456!!Screenshot_2.jpg|width=700,height=482!

title: BHT Web App - Resources - Products
description: As a BHT user, I’m able to purchase medical products such as face masks, gloves, oxygen tank,.. etc. This has a benefit on economic development when we are trying to provide users with expeditious medical solutions in quarantine*Acceptance Criteria:** Add a new tab called Products next to Articles* Both guest and logged user can access Product tab+_Product list_+* Display products of BHT default merchant* A product display includes** Image** Name (display ellipsis if its length takes more than 2 lines)** Discount price** Original price* “Add to cart” button** This is positioned below each product** Clicking on the button of a product adds that product to cart and display toast message, “Product has been added to shopping cart“*** In the mean time, the number badge of shopping cart is also increased (more about shopping cart [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1597|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KSWAT-1597|smart-link] )* If there are more than 8 products, there is “View more“ button to see next items* Search products** There is a search bar positioned on the top-right corner** Search products based on their names, including normal letters, special characters, accented languages** When there is no results, display “No products found“* Sort by** This is drop-down menu including 2 options*** “Price: Low to High“: this is the default sort. This sorts products from lowest to highest price When a product has a discount price, it is sorted by discount price*** “Price: High to Low“: This sorts products from highest to lowest price. When a product has a discount price, it is sorted by discount price+_Product details_+* Clicking on a product name or product image goes to detail page of that product* There is a back button to return Product page** If I have searched something before, when clicking on back it keeps the result * Product details includes** Image** Name** Description** Options* “Add to cart” button** This is positioned below each product** Clicking on the button of a product adds that product to cart and display toast message, “Product has been added to shopping cart“*** In the mean time, the number badge of shopping cart is also increasedMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/36deaada-e95b-453b-b1bc-7c8ef9ac95b7/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/36deaada-e95b-453b-b1bc-7c8ef9ac95b7/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web App - Logged users - Orders
description: As a BHT user, I should have the ability to view my orders even order details. This is beneficial source to keep track what I have ordered*Acceptance Criteria:** Add a new menu called Orders to profile menu. It is positioned below “Account“ menu.* Only logged users can access Orders page* There are 2 main tabs in Orders page: Processing and Completed+_Processing tab_+* Display orders whose delivery methods are Pickup and Delivery and they are not complete* With {color:#6554c0}*Pick up orders*{color}** Display following things*** Store Name*** Order Number*** Delivery Type: this is “Pickup“*** Order Date*** Order Amount*** Pickup Address*** Pickup Time*** Status: this includes New, Preparing, Ready*** “Scan to Pickup“ button: clicking on this displays a modal including following things:**** Store Name**** QR code**** Store logo**** Order Number**** Order Amount** When clicking on a pick up order, user goes to the detail of that order, including following things*** Store Name*** Order Number*** Delivery Type: this is “Pickup“*** Pickup Address*** Pickup Time*** Status*** “Pick up“ button: clicking on this displays a modal as when clicking on “Scan to Pickup“ button*** The list of items*** “Total“ area*** Back button: clicking on this is back to Processing tab* With {color:#ff5630}*Confirm Delivery orders*{color}** Display following things*** Store Name*** Order Number*** Delivery Type: this may be “Delivery \[Scan QR Code]“ or “Delivery \[Leave at Door]“*** Order Date*** Order Amount*** Delivery Address*** Delivery Time*** Status: this includes New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping*** “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button: clicking on this displays a modal including following things:**** Store Name**** QR code**** Store logo**** Order Number**** Order Amount** When clicking on a delivery order, user goes to the detail of that order, including following things*** Store Name*** Order Number*** Delivery Type: this may be “Delivery \[Scan QR Code]“ or “Delivery \[Leave at Door]“*** Delivery Address*** Delivery Time*** Status*** “Delivery“ button: clicking on this displays a modal as when clicking on “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button*** The list of items*** “Total“ area*** Back button: clicking on this is back to Processing tab+_Completed tab_+* Display orders whose delivery methods are Pickup and Delivery and they are complete* With {color:#6554c0}*Pick up orders*{color}** Display information as that in Processing tab but there are no status and “Scan to Pickup“ button** When clicking on a pick up order, it goes to details of order and displays information as that in Processing tab but status is Completed and there is not “Pick Up“ button* With {color:#ff5630}*Confirm Delivery orders*{color}** Display information as that in Processing tab but there are no status and “Scan to Confirm Delivery“ button** When clicking on a pick up order, it goes to details of order and displays information as that in Processing tab but status is Completed and there is not “Delivery“ button+_KardPOS and KardOrderDelivery app_+* Ensure KardPOS and KardOrderDelivery can work functionally when scanning QR code of pickup or delivery orders. It should work the same as Kard did. Mockup: see attached images

title: BHT Web App - Orders - Order Confirmation email
description: As a BHT user or a guest, I’m able to receive email about my order status.*Acceptance Criteria:*+_Orders of BHT users_+* This logic is the same with that in Kard Web.* With Pickup orders: ** When the order is just created, status is New, there is no email sent** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent* With Delivery orders: ** When the order is just created, status is New, there is no email sent** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent** When the order status is changed to Shipping, there is an email sent** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent+_Orders of guest_+* With Pickup orders: ** When the order is just created, status is New, there is an email sent. Email content includes*** Order ID*** Order Date*** Unit Price*** Total Price*** Sub total*** Tax*** Total*** QR code** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created but there is no QR code** Ensure KardPOS can functionally scan QR Code attached in emails as Kard has worked* With Delivery orders: ** When the order is just created, status is New, there is an email sent. Email content includes*** Order ID*** Quantity*** Product Name*** Unit Price*** Total Price*** Sub total*** Tax*** Total*** QR code** When the order status is changed to Preparing, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created** When the order status is changed to Ready, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.** When the order status is changed to Shipping, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created.** When the order status is changed to Completed, there is an email sent. Email content also includes things as when the order is just created but there is no QR code** Ensure KardOrderDelivery can functionally scan QR Code attached in emails as Kard has workedEmail Templates:[^PickupOrderEmail.rar][^DeliveryOrderEmail.rar]

title: BHT Web App - Shopping Cart
description: As as BHT user, I should have the ability to access shopping cart where I can see added products and proceed to checkout*Acceptance Criteria:** There is shopping cart icon added to navigation bar* Re-use logics of shopping cart from[https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-990|smart-link] * Display the list of added products* On each product, display following things:** Product image** Product name** Price on one unit** Price on total units** Quantity-adjusting tool** Thrash button* Order Summary section: includes following things** Sub total** Tax** You pay** Payment Method** Delivery Method** “Proceed to checkout“ button+_Payment method_+* If I’m a guest, I do not see Pay,ment method* If I’m a logged user, I see the list of cards that I have added** I can select one of cards to be payment method** It only allows Credit Cards usage** I can select another card by clicking on arrow button. Clicking on arrow buttons displays a modal including added cards.** I can add a new card by clicking on “Add new card“ button. It only allows adding Credit Cards** If I have not added any cards, display text link “Select payment method”. When clicking on the link text, display the modal including “Add new card“ button+_Delivery method_+* It displays “Select“ text link as default. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal with 2 methods** Delivery*** Both guest and logged user can select this*** If I’m a guest, selecting Delivery displays a modal including following things**** Full Name**** Phone Number**** Email**** Shipping Address**** Receive Order Method: includes 2 radios buttons***** Scan QR Code (displayed as default)***** Leave At Door**** Delivery Date: display date-picker**** Delivery Time: display time milestones**** “Confirm” button: display validation text in case I click on the button while fields are blank.**** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal **** After clicking on the button, I navigate back to shopping cart. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Scan QR Code” or “Leave At Door“ depending on my selected Receive Order Method. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal again**** I can update any fields as well*** If I’m a logged user, it also displays fields as in case of guest but it automatically fills in Full Name, Email. This logic is nearly the same with that in Kard Web app.** Pickup*** Both guest and logged user can select this*** If I’m a guest, selecting Pickup displays a modal including following things**** Full Name**** Phone Number**** Email**** Pickup Address: display all the locations of merchants**** Pickup Date: display date-picker**** Pickup Time:display time milestones**** “Confirm” button: display validation text in case I click on the button while fields are blank.**** Back button: clicking on this is back to Select Delivery Method modal **** After clicking on the button, I navigate back to shopping cart. Now, “Select“ text link is changed into “Pickup“. Clicking on it displays Select Delivery Method modal again**** I can update any fields as well*** If I’m a logged user, it also displays fields as in case of guest but it automatically fills in Full Name, Email. This logic is nearly the same with that in Kard Web app.+_Shopping Cart rules based on guest and logged users_+*  As a guest, refreshing page keeps product added until I clear cookies. For instance, a guest has added 4 products then the shopping cart is refreshed. Guest still sees 4 products displayed in cart* If a guest adds some products to cart then logs in, shopping cart displays products that guest has added. For instance, BHT user (account A) added 4 products to cart then logged out. A guest goes to BHT site and adds 10 products to cart then logs in as account A. After logging in, I see 4 products displayed in cart* If a BHT user adds some products to cart then logs out, I see nothing in cartMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/ed6916ee-a9a5-489e-9074-8f7e5e7734fb/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/ed6916ee-a9a5-489e-9074-8f7e5e7734fb/|smart-link]

title: BHT Web App - Checkout
description: As a user experiencing BHT products, I should have the ability to check out based on what I have added to shopping cart.*Acceptance Criteria:** {color:#36b37e}*In case of a guest*{color}*,* when I click on “Proceed to checkout“ button in shopping cart, there is a pop-up displayed, including Login form, Pay as Guest button, Register hyperlink** Login: after logging in successfully, I still stay at shopping cart. Clicking on “Proceed to checkout“ button navigates to Confirm&Payment screen *** Confirm&Payment screen includes **** Summary section: include Your total (the total price of items), Tax (tax of merchant), You Pay (The total price including tax)**** Card Image: this is the image of card that I have selected as a payment method**** “Pay” button: clicking on this completes the payment*** After payment is complete**** It leads me to Complete page including order ID displayed***** There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this goes to Processing tab of Order page**** Transactions: it records transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, BHT Tenant Admin***** Transaction Type: Payment**** Ensure the order is displayed in KardPOS to works functionally as Kard has worked** Pay as Guest: selecting this navigates to Confirm&Payment screen *** There is a back button called Confirm Purchase. Clicking on this is back to shopping cart*** Confirm&Payment screen includes **** Summary section: include Your total (the total price of items), Tax (tax of merchant), You Pay (The total price including tax)**** Payment Information: this is to enter Credit Card information**** Billing Address**** “Shipping Address same as Billing Address“ checkbox***** When this is selected, it means Shipping Address is the same as Billing Address***** The default value is SELECTED***** When this is not selected, display Shipping Address section**** Shipping Address**** “Pay <you pay value>” button:***** Clicking on this completes the payment***** If I have not selected Payment Method, the button is disabled***** If there are some fields being blank in Shipping Address or Billing Address section, clicking on the button sees some validation text*** After payment is complete**** It leads me to Complete page including order ID displayed***** There is “Great\!” button. Clicking on this goes to Processing tab of Order page**** Transactions: it records transaction in Vispay, ARM Merchant, ARM Master, Customer Support, BHT Tenant Admin***** Transaction Type: Payment**** Ensure the order is displayed in KardPOS to works functionally as Kard has worked* {color:#ff5630}*In case of a logged user*{color}, when I click on “Proceed to checkout“ button in shopping cart, it navigates to Confirm&Payment screen. It works functionally as the case guest logs in+_Confirm&Payment rules based on guest and logged users_+* As a guest that has added some products, while staying at Confirm&Payment screen, if I log in with BHT user, it navigates back to shopping cart and displays products that guest has added. For instance, a BHT user (account A) added 4 products to cart then logged out. A guest goes to BHT site and adds 6 products then goes to Confirm&Payment screen, if that guest logs in as account A, it’s immediately back to shopping cart and displays 6 products Mockup: * Logged user: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/9f0b8e09-bc6d-49cf-845a-7f615419c09b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/9f0b8e09-bc6d-49cf-845a-7f615419c09b/|smart-link] * Guest: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/6f22df17-3517-4b30-8130-adda2ed83451/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/74dddeba-10da-48c5-8a6c-cc3b33b03dab-218e/screen/6f22df17-3517-4b30-8130-adda2ed83451/|smart-link]

title: PathoCare - Transactions page - Enhance UI to display the donate transaction
description: +*AC:*+* Hide the transactions from Wallet page.!image-20210405-072410.png|width=1612,height=674!!image-20210405-072434.png|width=1621,height=762!* Update the UI and function same as the Transactions page from the top menu bar (refer to this ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1768|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1768|smart-link] )!image-20210405-064832.png|width=1636,height=1146!* For the donate transaction, user can click on the row of transaction to open the transaction details page:** Title: Transaction Type (*Cause2Fund*)** Amount: *-* *<money amount>* (Ex: - $5,000.00)** Transaction ID: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Display an icon next to that allows user to add this transaction ID to clipboard.** Description:{color:#ff5630} {color}*_“Donate to a project“_*** Status: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- {color:#ff991f}*Pending* {color}/ {color:#36b37e}*Completed* {color}*/* {color:#ff5630}*Rejected*{color}** Transaction Date: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Sample format (Oct 06 at 06:49 PM)** Remitter:*** If using Kash Kard to donate: show Kash Kard/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of K.K)*** If using Credit Card to donate: show Credit Card/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of C.C)*** If using Bank Account to donate: show Bank Account** Beneficiary: Merchant Name/*xxxx (xxxx: the last four digits of KK)** Donate Method: displaying all the methods which has been used to donated** -Gift Card Name:- *-Gift Card Name-*** -Gift Card Amount: diplaying the amount of gift card which has been used.-** -Point Amount: diplaying the amount of points which has been used.-** -Point Exchange Rate-** Project: *Project Name** For the displayed data on the Transactions page (list and detail), refer to these documents:** List: [https://onedrive.live.com/edit.aspx?cid=4602615e3ef0800c&page=view&resid=4602615E3EF0800C!7785&parId=4602615E3EF0800C!4352&app=Excel|https://onedrive.live.com/edit.aspx?cid=4602615e3ef0800c&page=view&resid=4602615E3EF0800C!7785&parId=4602615E3EF0800C!4352&app=Excel|smart-link] ** Detail: [https://onedrive.live.com/edit.aspx?cid=4602615e3ef0800c&page=view&resid=4602615E3EF0800C!11011&parId=4602615E3EF0800C!4352&app=Excel|https://onedrive.live.com/edit.aspx?cid=4602615e3ef0800c&page=view&resid=4602615E3EF0800C!11011&parId=4602615E3EF0800C!4352&app=Excel|smart-link]

title: PathoCare / BHT - Support user donating with bank account (via Plaid or Wire Transfer method)
description: As a consumer, I want to be able to donate a project by the added bank account in my wallet.+*AC:*+*_For PathoCare / BHT users:_** On the project page, user clicks Donate button, then they enter amount to donate.* User will click Select Payment Method below or the default card to change the method.* There are two methods that I can use to donate by the bank account, we will apply these two methods with the function and UI as same as loading money from bank account to kash kard.** *_ACH via Plaid_*** *_Wire Transfer_*_: For this method:_*** User can receive the info via an email to transfer money. ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4072|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4072|smart-link]) *** User can be reminded to settle after 24 hours. ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4053|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4053|smart-link]) * After finishing, the transactions will be recorded with Pending status on: ** Transactions page on the web app** Transactions page on VisiPay site ** Transactions page on Admin site* When the transaction is completed:** Transaction will be recorded on ARM site (Master Admin and Merchant Admin).* User can receive the result of transaction (completed or failed) via email ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4071|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-4071|smart-link])*_For guest users:_** The flow will be as same as the one for users.* Beside entering amount, a guest user needs to enter the email address to receive the relevant emails.

title: [Backend] - Update the donation with CC using Stripe
description: h3. *Description:*The problem we're trying to solve, is that when a consumer user or a guest user that want to donate to a merchant on Patho Care site for BHT site, they should be able to donate via their Credit Card and the donation will be sent to Merchant’s Stripe accounth3. *Acceptance Criteria:*GIVEN that I am user of PathoCare or BHT or a guest user of these sitesWHEN I am on donation pageTHEN I should be able to sent my donation via Credit Card----GIVEN that I am user of PathoCare or BHT or a guest user of these sitesWHEN I am on donation pageAND I sent my donation to the MerchantTHEN this merchant will receive my donation on their Stripe accountAND they will see that they need to pay a fee for Stripe and the processing fee for Visikard, the NET amount that they receivedAND the processing fee should be configured on Visipay just like current flow----GIVEN that the ARM userWHEN I am on the transactions pageTHEN I should be able to see the transaction list about the donation as currentlyAND the fee should be total fee of procession fee and Stripe’s fee

title: ARM - Stripe account configuration page
description: h3. *Description:*The problem we're trying to solve, is that when a merchant user that providing the donation feature for their users access the Account tab, the should have the ability to connect their Stripe account to our Stripe account so they can receive the donation via Credit cards.h3. *Acceptance Criteria:**Scenario 1: Merchant admin have a place to connect their Stripe account and manage it on ARM*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I am on the Payment tab of the Account pageTHEN I should now see the new tab on the right of “AirPay“ tab call “Stripe“----*Scenario 2: Merchant admin that never connect their Stripe account with Visikard will be able to do that*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I am on the Stripe tabAND my account has not connected with Visikard’s Stripe accountTHEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff5630}Not connected{color}AND A message _“Please connect your Stripe account to get the payments with credit card to this account“_AND A button {color:#00b8d9}\[Connect]{color}----*Scenario 3: Merchant admin connect their Stripe account to Visikard account*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I am on the Stripe tabAND I click on the {color:#00b8d9}\[Connect]{color} buttonTHEN I should be directed to a page of Stripe so I can login or create a new Stripe account if I don’t have a Stripe account yetAND after I loginTHEN I should be able to fill up my information to complete the connection flow on the Connect Onboarding page: business information, personal information, customer support information, etc.AND after I complete the flowTHEN I will should redirected back to the previous page on ARM.----*Scenario 4: Merchant admin with a pending account*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I completed providing all information on the Connect Onboarding pageAND Stripe is verifying my informationAND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARMTHEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff991f}Pending{color}AND I should see a message “Payments are paused while Stripe tries to verify recently provided details about your account“----*Scenario 5: Merchant admin with a restricted account*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I have not complete providing my information on the Connect Onboarding or there is information that is failed verifiedAND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARMTHEN I should see my account status is {color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}AND I should see a message “You need to provide more information to Stripe to enable payments on this account“AND I should see a {color:#00b8d9}\[Update Information]{color} button----*Scenario 6: Merchant admin with a restricted account update their information*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminAND my Stripe account status is RestrictedWHEN I click on the {color:#00b8d9}\[Update Information]{color} button THEN I should be redirected to the Connect Onboarding page to update my information----*Scenario 7: Merchant admin with a completed account*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN I have provided the required information to fully onboard onto StripeAND The information is verified by StripeAND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARMTHEN I should see my account status is {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}AND I should see a message “Your account has provided the required information to fully onboard onto Stripe. You can accept payments.“----*Scenario 8: Merchant admin with a connected account with any status*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN My connected Stripe has one of these status: {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}/{color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}/{color:#ff991f}Pending{color}AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARMTHEN I should see a button {color:#00b8d9}\[View Stripe Dashboard]{color}----*Scenario 9: Merchant admin with a connected account with any status view the Stripe dashboard*GIVEN that I am an Merchant adminWHEN My connected Stripe has one of these status: {color:#36b37e}Completed{color}/{color:#ff5630}Restricted{color}/{color:#ff991f}Pending{color}AND I go to the Stripe connection page on ARMAND I click button {color:#00b8d9}\[View Stripe Dashboard]{color}THEN I should be redirected to the Stripe dashboard.h3. Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8d0034ca-5c2a-416d-b694-e3250b5897ec-d853|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8d0034ca-5c2a-416d-b694-e3250b5897ec-d853|smart-link]

title: Kard Affiliate Web App - Agency Admin - Dashboard - FE
description: As an Agency admin, I should have the ability to view my dashboard where including statistical data.*Acceptance criteria*Agency admin sees following types of charts:+_Month Revenue_+* This is a line chart* Data displayed is Revenue of Kard Affiliate packages including** Affiliate** Agency** Driver** Concierge+_Revenue Analysis_+* Include Revenue by Product and Unit Sold. They are pie charts.* Data displayed on Revenue by Product** Affiliate** Agency** Driver** Concierge* Data displayed on Unit Sold** Affiliate** Agency** Driver** Concierge+_Revenue Table_+* Display revenue data on** Total** Yearly** Monthly** Average MonthlyMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/59f382d0-7aa8-4d36-bc97-c9cde672e268-0ca0/screen/89482149-9cef-4e07-8c35-ed9a83cae944/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/59f382d0-7aa8-4d36-bc97-c9cde672e268-0ca0/screen/89482149-9cef-4e07-8c35-ed9a83cae944/|smart-link]

title: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Member Accounts - FE
description: As an Affiliate user, I should have the ability to see all my members including basic information such as full name, email, join date,… etc. This makes a manageable contact with others members.*Acceptance Criteria:*There are two main tabs, Affiliate Accounts and Business Accounts+_Affiliate Accounts_+* Display the information of the invitees (Referrals) who are signed up to any of the affiliate products (Affiliate, Agency, Driver, Concierge).* Information of invitees includes the following things:** User ID** Full Name** Business Name** Email address** Sales Channel *** This always is Kard Affiliate** Joined date** Active status** KYC status.* There is a search bar** Search members based on Business Name or Email Address, or Full Name* There is page size menu+_Business Accounts_+* Display the information of the invitees (Referrals) who are signed up to any of the ARM products (Economy, Bronze, Silver, Gold).* Information of invitees includes the following things:** User ID** Full Name** Business Name** Email address** Sales Channel *** This always is Kard ARM** Joined date** Active status** KYC status.* There is a search bar** Search members based on Business Name or Email Address, or Full Name* There is page size menuMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/d2ae2f68-e2c2-43a2-aed3-213d1f7cdfdc/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/d2ae2f68-e2c2-43a2-aed3-213d1f7cdfdc/|smart-link]

title: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Products
description: As an Affiliate user, I’m be able to view information of packages. This is an benefit of users on suggesting available packages for sales.*Acceptance Criteria:** There is a new option on the left panel, called PRODUCTS.* Accessing PRODUCTS page, there are 2 main tabs, Affiliate Packages and Business Packages** Affiliate Packages: display Affiliate, Agency, Driver, and Concierge packages, including their benefits.** Business Packages: display Economy, Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages, including their benefits.+_Package buying_+* If I’m a user that has not purchased any Affiliate packages, I’m be able to purchase them.* Clicking on Select buttons postioned below each Affiliate package navigates to Shopping Cart page ** I can go to checkout ** There are some payment methods such as Credit Card, BTC, ETH, Kash Kard+_Package renewing_+* If I have purchased an Affiliate package, I’m be able to renew it* There is a button called Renew postioned below the Affiliate package that I have purchased** Clicking on the button goes to Shopping Cart page then goes to checkout as normalMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/7a557df2-ed96-4a5d-9738-a4e891acd6e5/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/7a557df2-ed96-4a5d-9738-a4e891acd6e5/|smart-link]

title: Kard Affiliate Web App - Affiliate - Dashboard
description: As an Affiliate user via Kard Affiliate platform, I should have the ability to get a dashboard including statistical data such as the number of packages, the percentage of commission,… etc*Acceptance Criteria*:+_Bonus sections_+* There are 2 bonus sections, Monthly Bonus and Bonus Analysis** Monthly Bonus:*** This is a column graph*** Display data of 4 commission types, including**** Membership Commission**** One Time Achievement Commission**** Retail Commission**** Referral ARM Sale** Bonus Analysis: this includes the following donut charts*** Commission Analysis: display the data of 4 commission types, including**** Membership Commission**** One Time Achievement Commission**** Retail Commission**** Referral ARM Sale*** Referrals Analysis: display the following data**** ARM packages including Kard Economy, Kard Bronze, Kard Silver, Kard Gold**** Kard Affiliate packages including Affiliate, Agency, Driver, Concierge**** Regular*** One-time Achievement commission**** This is a number-counting chart, like a clock**** Display the total data of commissions on both Affiliate and ARM packages***** The Total Achievement Bonus on Affiliate packages is $74,000.00***** The Total Achievement Bonus on ARM packages is $74,000.00**** Calculate the remaining days until Affilate user reaches $148,000.00***** For example, I have reached $11,000.00 in total of Affiliate packages and $12,000.00 in total of ARM packages so that both reaches 10,000 volume milstone. Therefore, each one gives user $500.00 so that the total is $500.00+$500.00 = $1,000.00. The remaining part that I have to try is $148,000.00 - $1,000.00 = $147,000.00 so that the text is “$147,000.00 remaining to reach $148,000.00 milestone“+_Top winner sections_+* I can see “TOP 5 WINNERS IN SALES“ section* I can see “TOP 5 WINNERS IN COMMISSIONS“ sectionMockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/8f2b6fb3-1b79-4eb7-9eb2-c58c5cf49c76/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3a645543-81cd-481b-afcf-be019bfab5e1-6f37/screen/8f2b6fb3-1b79-4eb7-9eb2-c58c5cf49c76/|smart-link] Commission Type Definition: [^NewVforceCommission Type.xlsx]

title: [Android] - Entertainment - Redeem Offer
description: +*AC:*+*For the offer which can be redeemable:*From the offer detail screen, I can see a button named *Redeem Now*. On tapping, display a confimation pop-up with two options:* No: close the pop-up, cancel the redeem action.* Yes: open the Redeem screen.On Redeem screen, the web view of the offer info details returned from API of Entertainment should be opened, all the info below should be match the one from Entertainment site:* Business name* Offer description* Redemption ID (or barcode or QR code depending on offer type)* Expiration date* Entertainment logo* Store address* Phone number* Fine Print* Rule of UseDepending on each type of offer, merchant staff can enter offer ID, scan barcode or QR code to redeem for me.After redeeming successfully, I can tap Done to get back to Offers tab of Marketplace screen, on exactly the category containing the store that I have selected before.+_Note:_+If an offer cannot be redeemed, when tapping Redeem button show the message pop-up *_“This offer cannot be redeemed now“._*+*_Mockup:_*+ Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/b8142c30-a43f-45be-bba1-460844c3514e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/b8142c30-a43f-45be-bba1-460844c3514e/|smart-link] Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|smart-link]

title: ARM - KYC Form - Allow multiple business owners
description: As a system admin, I want merchants to be able to specify the information of multiple owners who own more than 25% the company.* Merchant can submit multiple owners in KYC form. * Title field is required for Business Owner. (*updated on Mar 24 2021*)* Merchant can remove owner that they do not need anymore. title: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement Calculator
description: +*AC:*+On Settlement Settings page, I want to have a button named *Preview*. After I configure the revenue sharing, I can click to preview the table of revenue statistis for each member in a group.The table will be shown on a pop-up:* Title: *Revenue Sharing Preview** Three fields to enter amount** Base Amount: default $0.00** Additional Fee: default $0.00** Total Amount: default $0.00* *Check* button: On clicking, the table is shown below.* Table content: !Screen Shot 2021-03-02 at 14.50.23.png|width=50%!*Revenue Sharing Flow** When the payment has been made, the amount of money will be allocated and deposited into the revenue-sharing accounts based on the configuration of each Fee type and the selected Payor & Payees. See the payment flow example below for details:** I assume that I have created group A with 4 members: 1 Owner, 1 Service Provider, and 2 Partners. Three fee types are configured for this group as below:_1.Reservation fee:_ * Payor: User. * Source: Total amount* Payees: Owner, partner 1, partner 2, Kanoo, Service Provider.||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*|||1|BTCU (partner)|Fixed Amount|B$0.50|0%||2|Uni-ride  (Owner)|Fixed Amount|B$1.00|23%||3|MOBI (partner)|Fixed Amount|B$3.00|12%||4|Kanoo|Fixed Amount|B$0.75|12%||5|Driver (Service Provider)|Fixed Amount|B$1.00|0%|_2.Service fee:_ * Payor: Service Provider* Source: Base amount* Payees: Owner, partner 1, Kanoo||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*|||1|Uni-ride  (Owner)|Percentage (%)|1.50%|12%||2|MOBI (partner)|Percentage (%)|2.25%|12%||3|Kanoo|Percentage (%)|0.50%|12%|_3.Processing fee:_ * Payor: Uni-ride (Owner)* Source: Total amount* Payees: Kanoo ||*No*||*Member Name*||*Type*||*Fee*||*Fee VAT(%)*|||1|Kanoo|Percentage (%)|4.00%|12%|* The customer pays for Uni-ride (Owner) $48.00, including a $3.00 Parking fee (Additional fee).  ** Based on the allocated Reservation fee, the system will take $6.25 for Fee, and $0.75 for VAT on the Booking fee from the amount paid by the customer. This amount will be shared among entities (Payees). The remaining amount = Total amount - Reservation fee = 48 - 6.25 - 0.75 = $41.00.!image-20201214-104340.png|width=855,height=139!** The system will take $3.00 as an Additional fee and pay to Service Provider. The remaining amount = 41 - 3 = $38.00. This amount will be sent to Driver (Service Provider).** Then based on the allocated Service fee, the system will calculate based on Base amount ($38.00) then share among entities (Payees), $1.62 for Fee and $0.19 for VAT. The remaining amount = 38 - 1.62 - 0.42 = $36.19. !image-20201214-105458.png|width=858,height=138!** Driver (Service Provider) will take $2.15 ($1.92 for Fee, $0.23 for VAT) and pay to Payees as a Processing fee. This fee is calculated based on Total amount ($48.00) as configured. The remaining amount = 36.19 - 1.92 - 0.23 = $34.04.!image-20201214-105856.png|width=871,height=146!** Summary:*** Driver (Service Provider) will receive total = 34.04 + 3 (Additional fee) + 1 (Reservation fee) = *$38.04*.*** Uni-ride (Owner) will receive total = 1.30 (Reservation fee) + 0.64 (Service fee) = *$1.94*.*** Kanoo will receive total = 0.84 (Reservation fee) + 0.21 (Service fee) + 2.15 (Processing fee)= *$3.20*.*** BTCU (Partner) will receive total = 0.50 (Reservation fee) = *$0.50*.*** MOBI (Partner) will receive total = 3.36 (Reservation fee) + 0.96 (Service fee) = *$4.32*.

({color:#36b37e}*Approve* {color}/ {color:#ff991f}*Pending* {color}/ {color:#ff5630}*Rejected*{color} / {color:#ff5630}*Not Verified*{color})Button: *Verify / View KYC Info*. * The Verify button will be displayed for *Not Verified* and *Rejected* statuses. On clicking, merchant can be navigated to the KYC form page:** Not Verified: Display the KYC form as the first time submission.** Rejected: Each field on KYC form is pre-filled from the previous time when merchant submitted. Merchant can edit.* The View KYC Info button will be displayed for *Approve* and *Pending* statuses. On clicking, merchant can be navigate to the KYC form page:** Approve: *** Show the text at top *_“KYC is verified“_**** KYC form displays fully all the fields and only in view mode.*** Keep the document file and image.*** If merchant selected Corporation type, combine Company Information and Representative Information as one page.** Pending:*** Show the text at top *_“KYC is pending“_**** KYC form displays fully all the fields and only in view mode.*** Keep the document file and image.*** If merchant selected Corporation type, combine Company Information and Representative Information as one page.!image-20210301-044847.png|width=1032,height=516!

title: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement Group Detail - Add/Update
description: As a Kanoo admin, I want to be able to configure the revenue sharing groups about participants, sharing configuration.+*AC:*+I login to Kanoo Admin site by admin role.On Settlements page, I click Edit Group to open the configuration page:*Participants List*I can see a table displaying the list of partipants of the group. The table includes below columns:* Type: Displaying the participant type which can be** Owner** Service Provider** Partner* Name: Displaying as** *Service Provider* (fixed): If the type is Service Provider** *\[Business Name]*: If the type is Owner or Partner* Action:** When the table is in Edit mode*** *Save:* On clicking, save the new participant or save the info of existing participant.*** *Cancel:* On clicking, remove the added participant or cancel the edit action.** When the table is in View mode*** *Edit:* On clicking, show two buttons Save and Cancel. (refer to AC above)*** *Remove:* On clicking, the selected participant should be removed.I can add a new participant to the group by clicking Add Participant button, one more row is added temporarily on the table below the default row of Owner:* Type: ** Default value: *Select Type*** When clicking, display the list of types as a drop-down list including*** Service Provider*** Partner* Name:** Default value: *Select Business*** If the selected type is Service Provider, the name should be Service Provider (fixed value).** If the selected type is Partner, display the list of Kanoo businesses (merchants):*** The list only displays merchants which are active in Kanoo system.*** I can search by name. If no results found, show the message *_“No businesses found“_**** I can select only one merchant. If merchant A is selected already, selecting merchant B will auto deselect merchant A.* Action:** Save: Save the participant on the table_._ If Type or Name is not selected yet, the button should be disabled.*** A group can only have 1 service provider, if I add participant duplicating one of these role, show the red message below the table: *_“The service provider already exists in this group.“_*_._*** The owner of each group must be unique, if I add owner for another group, show the red message *_“This merchant is already the owner of another group.“_*** Note that two above rules will be validated when clicking Save Settings button.** Cancel: Remove the added row. The action is cancelled.{color:#00b8d9}+*_Note:_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#00b8d9}*_By default, the owner role is always available when creating a group. Admin only needs to select the business (Name) for this type._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Admin cannot remove the owner from a group._*{color}*Splitting Configuration*Below the pariticipants list, I can configure the revenue sharing. I can see a button named *Add Fee*. On clicking, a splitting fee configuration table should be added temporarily.On the splitting fee, I can select Fee Type, Source, Payor and Payee. Each field will be display as a drop-down list:* Title: *Splitting Fee n* (Ex: Splitting Fee 1, Splitting Fee 2…)* Fee Type: Default value: *Select Fee Type*** Processing Fee** Reservation Fee** Sevice Fee* Source: Default value: *Select Source*** Base Amount** Total Amount** Additional Amount* Payor: displaying the list of participants to select including User (except Kanoo). Default value: *Select Payor** Payee(s):** The payee list displayed as a table including columns:*** Payee Name: displaying the list of participants to select including Kanoo (except User). Default value: *Select Payee**** Type: Default value: *Select Type***** Percentage (%): the charged fee should be splitted by percentage for each participant**** Fixed Amount (B$): the charged fee should be splitted by fixed amount for each participant*** Value: Displaying a field to enter percentage or amount. Default value: *0*. I can only number (integers or decimals)*** VAT (%): Displaying a field to enter VAT percentage. Default value: *0*. I can only number (integers or decimals)*** Action:**** Remove: I can remove each payee row from the table.I can remove the splitting fee configuration table by clicking *Delete*.I can expand or collapse the splitting fee configuration table.I can add new payee by clicking *Add Member* button.At bottom, there are two buttons:* *Save Settings:* On clicking:** I can save a new group just added with a toast message *_“Group added\!“_*, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.** I can save all configuration settings of the group with a toast message *_“Group settings saved\!“_*, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.* *Cancel:* On clicking, the create action or edit action on this page is cancelled, then I should be navigated back to Setttlements page.{color:#00b8d9}+*_Note:_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9}*In a splitting fee configuration table, admin cannot add two row of payee having the same name, (Ex: If I added Uni-ride for the first row of payee, the next rows of payee should not contain “Uni-ride“ again)*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*Admin cannot add multiple Splitting Fee configuration having the same fee type. (Ex: If I added already a splitting fee configuration with fee type “Service Fee“, the next fee configurations should not contain “Service Fee“ again)*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/6eec9a9d-f667-4506-9597-57f6f8ebf9a5|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/6eec9a9d-f667-4506-9597-57f6f8ebf9a5|smart-link]

title: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Transactions for Merchant view
description: As a participant of the revenue sharing group, I want to view the transaction history after the transaction is completed successfully.+*AC:*+I login to the site by merchant role.On Transactions page:* Display the list of main transactions (from Uni-Ride to my merchant) after the transaction is completed:* The transaction table includes columns:** Transaction ID** Owner Name** Total Amount: Displaying the amount which user paid finally, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)** Revenue Amount: Displaying the final amount which I got, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made, sample format: Mar 01, 2021, 13:22* I can search by Transaction ID, Reference ID (*updated on Mar 29, 2021*)* I can filter by date range* I can export CSV:** The CSV file should contain the transaction details list from all main transactions.** I can only export CSV with maximum 3 months, if the filter range is more than that, show the message pop-up *_“This feature only supports maximum 3 months in range.“_** On some columns (Remitter and Transaction Date) I can sort** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) ** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. When clicking the button on each row of transaction, I can open the transaction details page. On that page:* Display the list of transaction in details:** For the participant which is a partner of the group: they can see the transactions of fee paying from other participants to them.** For the participant which is an owner of the group: they can see the transactions of fee paying from all participants to each other.* The transaction table includes columns:** Transaction ID** Reference ID: display the transaction ID of the selected main transaction** Remitter: Displaying the name of fee payor** Remitter Card: Displaying the last four digits of Cash Card / Sand Dollar** Category: *** *Reservation Fee**** *Service Fee**** *Processing Fee*** Total Amount: Displaying the total of fee amount (after VAT).** VAT: Displaying the amount of fee VAT.** Payment Method:*** *Cash Card:* if the transaction is paid by cash card or gift cash card.*** *Credit Card:* if the transaction is paid by credit card (only for Guest)*** *Sand Dollar:* if the transaction is paid by sand dollar card** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/f7f7dc1d-f0d1-4ded-a3c3-6e54dd11476c/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/f7f7dc1d-f0d1-4ded-a3c3-6e54dd11476c/|smart-link]

title: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Transactions for Admin view
description: As a Kanoo admin, I want to view the transaction history of sharing groups after the transaction is completed successfully.+*AC:*+On Transactions page:* Display the list of main transactions (from User to Uni-ride (owner)) after the transaction is completed:* The transaction table includes columns:** Transaction ID** Reference ID** Status: Completed / Failed** Beneficiary: *Uni-ride*** Remitter: Displaying user name (Kanoo consumer who made transaction)** Additional Amount: Displaying the amount of additional fee (parking fee, toll fee…), format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$3.00)** Gross Amount: Displaying the amount of orginal sale price. format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$38.00)** Total Amount: Displaying the amount which user has to pay finally, format: *B$x,xxx.xx* (Ex: B$48.00)** Payment Method:*** *Cash Card:* if the transaction is paid by cash card or gift cash card.*** *Credit Card:* if the transaction is paid by credit card (only for Guest)*** *Sand Dollar:* if the transaction is paid by sand dollar card** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made, sample format: *Mar 01, 2021, 13:22** I can search by Beneficiary, Remitter, Transaction ID, Reference ID* I can filter by date range* I can export CSV:** The CSV file should contain the transaction details list from all main transactions.** I can only export CSV with maximum 3 months, if the filter range is more than that, show the message pop-up *_“This feature only supports maximum 3 months in range.“_** On some columns (Beneficiary, Remitter and Transaction Date) I can sort it ** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) ** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. When clicking the button on each row of transaction, I can open the transaction details page. On that page:* Display the list of transaction which User or Driver pays the fee splitting for the remaining participants.* The transaction table includes columns:** Transaction ID** Reference ID: display the transaction ID of the selected main transaction** Beneficiary: Displaying the name of fee payee: group participants (except User)** -Beneficiary Card: Displaying the last four digits of-*** -Cash Card: if user made payment by cash card, gift cash card or credit card.-*** -Sand Dollar Card: if user made payment by sand dollar card.-** Remitter: Displaying the name of fee payor** -Remitter Card: Displaying the last four digits of Cash Card-** Category: *** *Base Cost**** *Reservation Fee**** *Service Fee**** *Processing Fee*** Additional Amount: Displaying the amount of additional fee (parking fee, toll fee…)** Total Amount: Displaying the total of fee amount (after VAT).** VAT: Displaying the amount of fee VAT.** -Payment Method:-*** *-Cash Card-**** *-Gift Cash Card-**** *-Credit Card-**** *-Sand Dollar-*** Transaction Date: Display the date when the transaction is made.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/3c9e97ff-196f-4813-8222-0cbd38a9c50d|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/3c9e97ff-196f-4813-8222-0cbd38a9c50d|smart-link]

title: [BE] Kanoo Admin - Settlement groups list
description: As a Kanoo admin, I want to be able to create a new group for revenue sharing among stakeholders.+*AC:*+I login to Kanoo Admin site, on the list of left menu items, I can click *Settlements* item to open Settlements page.On Settlements page, I can see:* A table of created sharing groups including columns:** Group Name: displaying the name of group, show maximum in 1 line, if the name is too long, use ellipsis, I can hover the mouse point to view full.** Owner Name: displaying the owner name of group, show maximum in 1 line, if the name is too long, use ellipsis, I can hover the mouse point to view full.** Participants: displaying the number of members.** Status: Active / Inactive. When the status is Active, the revenue sharing works normally. Otherwise, it’ll not work, the transaction amount is only shared for the owner. ** Create Date: displaying the created date, sample format: *Mar 05, 2021*** Action:*** Edit Group*** Activate / Deactivate*** Delete* I can create a new group.* I can search groups by group name, owner name.* I can filter groups by status.* On each column (except Action) I can sort:** By alphabet (a-z / z-a) ** By number (smallest to largest / largest to smallest)** By the created date (latest to oldest / oldest to latest)* By default, the table is sorted by the latest created date from top downwards. *_Create New Group_*I click New Group button to open a new page to create a group.On the new page:* I can input the group name at top. ** Default value: *Group Name*** The group name must be unique. If duplicating, show the red message *_“The group with this name exists already. Please use another name.“_*** If the group name is empty, show the red message *_“Group name is required.“_*** Max length: 60 characters (including spaces). If exceeding, show the red message *_“Group name cannot be more than 60 characters.“_*_._ If the name has space characters at the beginning or end, it should be auto trimmed.* I can add / edit / remove participants.* I can configure sharing: Add / edit / remove splitting fee configuration.* At bottom of page, I can click *Save Settings* button to save the group, show a toast message *_“Group added\!“_*, after that I should be navigated to Settlements page.*Edit Group*I click Edit Group from Action column to open the editting page.The UI should be as same as when creating group.On the page:* I can edit the group name. The new name must follow the same rule when creating new group.* I can edit the list of participants.* I can edit configuration of splitting for each participant.*Activate / Deactivate*When the status is Active, I can deactivate the group by clicking Deactivate from Action column:* Show the toast message *“Group deactivated\!“** Update the status from Active to Inactive.When the status is Inactive, I can deactivate the group by clicking Deactivate from Action column:* Show the toast message *“Group activated\!“** Update the status from Inactive to Active.*Delete*I click Delete from Action column to delete a group.When clicking, show the confirmation pop-up *_“Are you sure to delete the group \[Group Name]?“_* with two buttons:* Delete: closing the pop-up and deleting the group, show a toast message *_“Group deleted\!“_** Cancel: closing the pop-up, the action is cancelled.+_Note:_+If the Settlementspage has no groups at all or no searching results, show the message *_“No Groups Found.“_*+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/bf207ea6-01c7-473a-b708-62c17f58e090|https://xd.adobe.com/view/a58a7b9c-4016-4914-94d9-b4ecffef4a6e-f0d9/screen/bf207ea6-01c7-473a-b708-62c17f58e090|smart-link]

title: Visikard Admin - Dashboard - Fee Report
description: As a Visikard Admin, I want to see the statistics report for Fee.+*AC:*+*Fee Report** I can select to review the report of a month or a year. ** All: it will show the total of each year from the beginning to the current year. ** Default is the current month.* I can select multiple Fee types to view the report.* I can see the total fee for the selected month or year.* The list of fee types include:** Load Fee*** Load money from Credit Card to Kash Kard*** Load money from Bank Account to Kash Kard*** Load money from Crypto Card to Kash Kard*** Load money from Kash Kard to Crypto Card** Withdraw Fee:*** Withdraw cash from Kash Kard*** Withdraw to Bank Account from Kash Kard*** Withdraw from Crypto Card** Transfer Fee*** Transfer money from consumer to consumer (kash kard / crypto card)*** Transfer money from merchant to merchant** Merchant Processing Fee** Refund Fee** Mastercard Fee*** Create a Mastercard* I can export the statistic report to the pdf file. (*updated on Mar 22, 2021*)+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link]

title: ARM Master - Merchant Accounts - Resend KYC email
description: As a master admin, I would like to resend KYC email for merchants in case they miss the previous email or they forget to submit KYC before.+*AC:*+* I login to ARM site by master admin role.* On Merchant Accounts page, at Merchant Management tab, I want to have one more column named *KYC* before *Action*.* On this column:** Display the current KYC status of merchant: *** Not Verified*** Approved*** Rejected*** Pending*** Inapplicable (if merchant registers an account with Free package)** Display the *Resend* button:*** Select Action: send again the KYC email to merchant, **** If sending successfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent successfully.“_***** If sending unsuccessfully, show the message pop-up *_“KYC request email has been sent unsuccessfully.“_**** This button is only displayed if merchant hasn’t submitted KYC yet (*Not Verified*) or KYC status is *Rejected*, which their KYC request is not available at KYC Verification tab. For the KYC status *Approve*, *Pending*, and *Inapplicable*, this button should be hidden.*** Resend email content:**** *Not Verified*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2695|smart-link] **** *Rejected*: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2696|smart-link] !image-20210224-043150.png|width=1606,height=797!

title: [Backend] - Visikard Admin - Gift Card Catalog - Show all gift cards
description: As an Admin I want to be able to see all gift cards including ARM and Incomm ones on Gift Card Catalog page instead of seeing the gift cards associated with merchants only as now.* Merchant and Discount columns are empty for gift cards that don't belong to any merchant. This happens for Incomm gift cards only because they are not associated to any merchant when getting from Incomm server.* Disable a gift card - make sure that it is not showed on Online tab and other places of selling gift cards like Konnect Category, Marketplace of Points.* I want to be able to filter gift cards by type (In-Store, Incomm) like Gift Card Report page.* I can search gift cards by name or business name.* On Brand column, I want to view merchant detail of a gift card that is associated with a merchant. Otherwise, show Brand provided by Incomm if it is available. We can reuse the merchant detail form that we have from Visipay if possible. Otherwise, we can show the basic information for the associated merchant.+*_Mockup:_*+[https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/screen/3297d28e-3254-421b-bacc-678a94a6b4c9/|smart-link]

title: Visikard/Tenant Admin Report - Dashboard - Transaction Statistics
description: As a VisiKard admin, I want to be able to view the transaction statistics on Dashboard page of VisiKard Admin site.+*AC:*+*Transaction Statistics** I want to have the chart displaying the transaction statistics.* I want to have the filter set including:** Tenant: Displaying as drop-down list field, which contains all available tenants in system. The default value is *All*.** Type: *** Displaying as a drop-down list field, which contains all the transaction types from Transactions page. The default value is *Card Purchase*.*** I can select multiple tenants to filter.** View Mode: A drop-down list field contains two options:*** By Year: I can select a year that I want to view the chart. The default value is the current year.*** By Month: I select a month of the current year to view the chart. The default value is the current month.* On the chart:** If I select By Year view mode:*** I can see the list of 12 months of the selected year being displayed as the column.*** Each column is a month, which displays the total of transaction amount in that month.** If I select By Month view mode:*** I can see the list of days of the selected month in year displayed as the column.*** Each column is a date, which displays the total of transaction amount on that date.** I can see the total of revenue from All transactions by year or by month depending on what view mode I select.** I can export the chart to pdf file.* -Add Payment Method with below options to display the total amount of transactions that have- *-Remitter-* -or- *-Beneficiary-* -to be the selected method.-** -Kash Kard-** -Credit Card-** -ETH-** -BTC-** -ZVC-** -Bank-+_Notes_+No change for New Users -  the designer will correct the mockup because there is some change for these sections in the new mockup.+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/7feea843-3d2d-4958-ba7d-840084b54db8-2abd/|smart-link]

title: Security issue - Create annotation to prevent consumer user access admin's APIs
description: Currently the consumer user can call the APIs of admin user i.e load list users, load list transaction. We need to prevent them by adding the annotation which allow the visikard admin only

title: Security issue - review internal APIs
description: Currently we are adding API key to header of API automatically. We need to stop this action because it's breaking the security. To stop it we have to check:- Recheck the exclude list in each service, currently only the exclude list in api service working- Manual add the API key for all internal APIs- Add text "/internal/" into the internal APIs to let devops blocks the outside calling

title: Security issue - Do not push the sensitive data to third party
description: Currently we are passing the header (token, API key, deviceId and also the user info) in the header to third party when calling them. Please check and ignore them before sending outWe have the flag to ignore them already, please double check and add them into your methodsThere are:* PrimeTrust* APNS (apple)* Google cloud message or firebase or pax notification* Comdata* Davinci* Incomm* Gift tango(still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)* Entertainment (in future)* Redfin* Switchcommerce* [Authorize.net|http://Authorize.net]* Idology, Usio,[ACH.com|http://ACH.com] (still have the source code but we do not use it anymore)* Twilio* Kanoo* AWS (S3)* JWPlayer* CoinLayer* ACH* Plaid* QuickCard* Others (Rtui, Ommi card, blackhawk..) - Do not know about it

title: BE - Consumer App - Notifications Settings
description: As a customer, I want to be able to configure the settings to receive notifications from the system.+*AC:*+* I want to have a button/link from Notifications screen to open Notification Setting screen or I can open from left menu.* On this screen, I can turn on / turn off one by one type or all types of notifications that I want to get:** *By default:*, Enable Notifications and the types below are on.** When Enable Notifications is on:*** I can turn on / off the notification types below.*** The app will remember my previous settings and turn on exactly what I turned on before.** When Enable Notifcations is off, the notification types below are disabled.* Types of notification.** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]** [Gift Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Gift-Card]** [Promotion|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Promotion]** [Order|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Order]** [Message|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Message] +*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/552163a4-b695-4600-add4-c78819afd934/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] - Visikard Admin - Business Category Management
description: As a system admin, I want to be able to manage business categories to be associated with merchants without importing or synchronizing from Google as the current version.* I can delete one or multiple business categories that are not used by any merchant. If i delete a category being associated with any merchants, show the message pop-up *_“You cannot delete this category because it’s being used.“_** I can create/edit business categories.* I can select a category to view the list of merchants who are associated with it.[https://xd.adobe.com/view/851c1095-e8ac-43b3-8393-b87e38dc53a9-d04f/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/851c1095-e8ac-43b3-8393-b87e38dc53a9-d04f/|smart-link]

title: [BE] - Consumer App - Notifications UI
description: As a customer, I want to view my Notifications screen more clearly and easier to keep track.+*AC:*+* Update the UI and content on Notifications screen: [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link] (*Only update the available notification types in this scope)** I can filter my notifications:** Types:*** [Profile|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Profile]: display the notifications of connection with consumer or merchant and KYC verification.*** [Pay Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Pay-Card]: display the notification of transactions (send/receive money, load money, withdraw money, refund, *** [Gift Card|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Gift-Card]: display the notification of receiving gift card from friend or merchant.*** [Promotion|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Promotion]: display the notification of receiving coupon, new coupon / promotion from merchant and point reward*** [Order|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps#Order]: display the notification of order status updated** When using filter, I can see the selected type displayed above the list. I can click Show All to view all notifications as before.* Each notification will be shown with read and unread status in the list:** The notifications which is unread, the background is blue.** The notification can be updated to Read when:*** Tap banner notification (system).*** Tap notification on the Notifications screen.*** Tap Mark all as Read at top of Notifications screen.*** Tap Mark as Read on each notification.* I can mark one by one or all notification as Read:** *_Mark all as Read:_* this option should be only shown when there is at least one notification unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.** *_Mark as Read:_* this option should be only shown when the notification is unread. After tapping that, that one should be hidden.* I can clear one by one or all notifications. When I want to clear all, show the confirmation pop-up.* The number on Notifications item on the left menu is the number of unread message. The maximum is 99+.* In case there’s not any notifications or no filter results, show the message at center *_“No Notifications“_*+*_Mockup_*+: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b24737fd-e35f-4295-a57d-f876d7c5c2a9-e714/screen/f73b7f97-c811-4545-bd13-9011d0d5a112/|smart-link]

title: ARM Master - Review KYC requests for Merchants
description: +*AC:*+* On clicking Verify button from KYC Verification tab ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-2379|smart-link]), Verify New Merchant Information page will be opened. On the screen, the admin can see all information which merchant has submitted and the uploaded document files (for image admin can click to view as full mode). There are two buttons:** Approve: On clicking, show the Approved pop-up. Closing this pop-up will direct admin to Merchant Accounts page (KYC Verification tab) and KYC status of that merchant is updated to *Approved*.** Reject: On clicking, show the Reject Information pop-up. admin can enter reason (*this reason should be displayed in email of rejecting*):*** Reject:**** If Reject Reason field is missing or filled by blank, -this button is disable (grey out)- show the red message below the field *_“Reject reason is required.“_***** If Reject Reason field is filled, this button is enabled.*** Cancel: On clicking, close Reject Information pop-up only, the action is cancelled.* Merchants will be notified via email upon the approved or rejected verification.+*_Mockup:_*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/4bfc48c6-22ed-411a-b809-c7f5e556598c-1eaf/screen/6c5a64ff-1dbe-4860-9151-e30a8ad5c556/|smart-link]

title: ARM - KYC Verification Form
description: +*AC:*+The merchant clicks at the link in email sent to them after registering a new account.They will select Account Type they want to submit KYC verification *INDIVIDUAL* or *CORPORATE*.*_INDIVIDUAL_*{color:#ff5630} {color}* *General Information*** Full Name** Phone Number** Email** Date of Birth** Gender* *Address Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Country* State* City* Street Address* Postal Code|* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code|* *Identity Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Tax Country* Tax State* SSN or TIN|* Tax Country* Indentification Number|* Continue button: On clicking, the Upload Document is opened:** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit** Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzqYf4ilA2o-peph?e=gwhaKA|smart-link] *_CORPORATE_* *Company Information** *General Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Company Name* Email* Phone Number* Country* State:* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Tax State* Social Security Number* Region of Formation|* Company Name* Email* Phone Number* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Identification Number* Region of Formation|* *Documents:* Merchant can select the document to upload. ({color:#ff5630}*image* {color}and {color:#ff5630}*document*{color})* Continue button: On clicking, the next screen (*Representative Information*)*Representative Information*||*US*||*Non-US*|||* Title* Full Name* Email* Phone Number* Gender* Date of Birth* Country* State* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Tax State* Social Security Number|* Title* Full Name* Email* Phone Number* Gender* Date of Birth* Country* Region* City* Street Address* Postal Code* Tax Country* Identification Number|* Document** Merchant can select one of four types of {color:#ff5630}*image* {color}document to upload: ID Card / Driver Licence / Passport / Residence Permit.* Merchant clicks Continue button to finish submitting.Refer this link for more details: [https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|https://1drv.ms/x/s!AgyA8D5eYQJGxzz8KLBsk7kXEbXb?e=4ZqcOe|smart-link] +_Note:_+* For image documents, allow user to import the file with extensions *jpeg / jpg, png*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.* For text document, allow user to import the file with extensions *pdf, doc, docx*. The maximum size is 50MB for each file.* If user uploads any other files with invalid extension, show the error message {color:#00b8d9}*_“The extension of file is unsupported. Please import another file.“_*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b825d31e-b7c6-452f-4b9e-d4a144485670-ce14/|smart-link]

title: KanooPOS - Pay Unpaid Order
description: +*AC:*+* I click Pay Order button of unpaid orders from Order List or Order Detail screen to open the payment screen (same as when tapping Pay button from the menu list):** The paid amount is auto-filled by the order amount. Payment Cards will be the same, too.** Discount field will be not displayed.** The function works on this screen will be as same as the old flow. (scan Cash Card / Gift Cash Card / Sand Dollar with gift card)* After payment successfully:** If making payment from Order List screen (Unpaid tab):*** I will be navigated back to Order List screen (All Orders tab)*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.** If making payment from Order Detail screen (Unpaid tab):*** I will be navigated back to Order Detail screen (All Orders tab)*** The order status is updated to *Completed* and it will be synced to Kanoo mobile/web app.+_Note_+If the order is created for user A, there’s only user A who can make payment for this order, if another user makes payment, show the message *_“You cannot make payment because this order belongs to another user.“_* (this message is applied when making payment by cash card, gift cash card, sand dollar and gift card)+*Mockup:*+Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/6f667edc-bad1-427f-8fd7-f307e6a73f41-3a35/screen/cea24c53-9cb9-4d81-b8b4-34ca81967da9/|smart-link] Tablet: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/1fa22270-100f-400c-8d53-0c037b26123c-4af1/screen/71c1fefb-178f-49ec-a54b-b5e8b9b3ea75/|smart-link]

title: Android - Merge 4 consumer apps to 1 single branch
description: Our 4 apps the almost the same. They only have some differences on theme but we are maintaining 4 separated branch for them. That take a lot of effort and could cause bugs if developer have mistake on code merging.So we will change the approach to build 4 app on only 1 source code base. To do that we need:# Create a new branch to use that to build 4 apps.# Make this branch to have ability to build 4 apps. For iOS, we can use Build Target, for Android we can use build variants to do that.# Here are some differences between these apps: (I will have QC to list out these differences in detail to make sure that we cover all of them)#* Theme: colors and icons.#* Inviting commission flow.# Work with DevOps to integrate the CI/CD process to build these apps  from the new branch.# Merge new feature, bug fixing of S2053 to this branch to make sure that we have the latest codeNote: This ticket will be test on next sprint
