title: Wallet - Gift cards, Coupon, Punch cards
description: *Gift Card** Show all gift cards sorted by the latest added time* Each gift card shows** Image** Gift card number** QR code** Gift card code** Balance * Click on a gift card → pop-up show below information !image-20201013-083433.png|width=50%!*Coupon*: * Show all active coupons sorted by the latest added time* Each coupon shows** *Nov 16, 2020*: Business name (reuse Kard’s UI)** Image** Expiration date** Discount percentage*Punch card and Green stamp:** Show all items sorted by the latest added time!image-20201022-051840.png|width=953,height=469!* Each item shows** Image** Number of stamps I have/ number of stamps * I can only view details of punch card!image-20201022-052158.png|width=83.33333333333334%!* If I remove punch card → it will disappear from my wallet but I can add it again in store details

title: [BE] - Home page
description: After login successfully, I will be moved to Kanoo home page, then I would see:*Account area*: on the top right corner* My avatar: system avatar by default if I have not changed avatar.* Click on my avatar: a list of functions** KYC: *** Button “Get KYC verified” if I have not been verified → click move to “KYC Verification” page*** Button “KYC Verified” if I have been verified → click move to “KYC Limitation” page** Account  → click move to “Account Information” page** Update Wallet PIN ** Forgot Wallet PIN** Log out → click to logout and move to “Login” page*Menu*: I can explore Kanoo web by below menus* Kanoo logo → click move to the home page* Wallet → move to my wallet page* Marketplace → move to Marketplace page* Messages → move to Chat page* Transactions → move to Transactions page* Orders → move to Orders page* Shopping cart: show number of items I have added, must be synched with Kanoo app. -Displays “0” if the cart is empty- → click move to the cart page* Search → click move to the search page*Explore Kanoo** Show all categories of the default merchant.* Hide this area if:** Default merchant is inactive or expired.** The konnect zone is inactive or expired.* Click on a category → shows all items belong to that category ( for example: show products list if clicking Product category, reference UI of Kard)* I can click back to view categories list*What’s new today*: where I can see the latest promotions of Promotion Campaign of all merchants in the system* Promotion Campaign’s items: Videos and Images* Shows 8 latest items → 4 items by default → click “View more” to expand the rest. The list is sorted by the latest Created Date* Each item shows:** Business avatar** Business name** Date*** Unit: days or months*** Value = The current date - the created date*** Promotion’s content*** Promotion’s image or video**** Click to open a pop-up show image/ video and promotion’s content**** Can click to play video or download it*Points balance*: where I can see all points I have*Pay* → click to move to my wallet page*Connections* → click to move to my connections page*Message* → click to move to chat page*Recent Conversations*: where I can see the list of users which I have chatted recently.* The UI will be same as the current UI of Kard web.* !image-20201118-033518.png|width=1250,height=755!* The list of users is sorted by the lastest time that I have chatted with them.* Each user will have** User’s avatar.** User name: display “…” when the name reaches the limitation of the avatar’s area** Click on a user to open Messages screen with that user.+*Note*++:+ * What I can see will be updated for the latest information when I refresh the page.

title: Login - Forgot password - Forgot email
description: I can Login to Kanoo web like Kanoo app*Login** Click Login:** If enters an incorrect email → red text “This email address is not registered with Kanoo, please correct it or create a new account.”** *Nov 5, 2020*: -If email’s format is invalid → red text “Invalid email address format.”-** If email is not a consumer → red text “You cannot login using this email because it has been registered for other purposes.”** If password is incorrect → red text “You have entered an invalid password. Attempted <number>/5.”** If password is incorrect 5 times → pop-up with content “Your account has been locked. Please contact your Administrator.”** If any required fields is blank → red text “This field is required.”* Login successfully → move to the home page*Forgot mail** Click on “Recovery Email” on the left menu* I have to enter my registered phone → enter Authentication Code (expire after 2 mins) → I will receive an SMS with instruction to get my email!image-20201022-042549.png|width=66.66666666666666%!*Forgot pass** Click on “Request New Password” on the left menu* I can provide Email or Phone to request password → continue the current flow on App** Option “Use my email” is displayed by default → enter a valid email → I receive an email with a link → click on the link to change my password** I choose “Use my phone number” → textbox for email is replaced with textbox for phone number → enter Authentication code → enter new password → back to log-in screen if change successfully.* Reuse all messages from Kanoo App!image-20201022-040251.png|width=599,height=268!!image-20201022-040439.png|width=1067,height=365!*Message on Kanoo App** Enter an invalid email or send SMS failed: “Invalid phone number.”* Enter an invalid code: “Verification code is invalid.”* Authentication code is expired: “Verification code is expired.”Note* Nov 5, 2020: when someone logins while the user is exploring Kanoo Web → move user back to login page → show message “You have been Logged Out. Someone has signed in using your account.”

title: Registration
description: As a consumer, I would like to create an account on Kanoo web app* I access to the Kanoo web site and I would see ( Reference UI)* Click “Contact” → move to Contact page of Kanoo. [~accountid:5ea291d7a77bf50c1ec77c19]{color:#ff991f} We don’t have the design for the contact page.{color}!image-20201022-042325.png|width=1402,height=644!* Use the current messages of Kanoo* Phone number: use the current design and format of Kanoo* For registration an account, I have to provide below information: ** First name and Last name** Mail** Phone  with format [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2126|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2126|smart-link] ** Verification code: expired after 60s** Gender** Birthday ** Password** PIN** Avt*** After upload avt → automatically scale 150x150 → button Skip turns into Continue*** Click on the avt to upload another image* Validation:** If required fields are blank → red text “This field is required.”** If email is already existed → red text “This email address is already registered by another user.”** If email is incorrect → red text “This email address is not registered with Kanoo, please correct it or create a new account.”** If email’s format is incorrect → red text “Invalid email address format.”** If the phone number is invalid → red text “The phone number is invalid, please correct.”** If the phone number is already existed → red text “This phone number already exists. Please choose another one.”** If the verification code is incorrect → red text “Verification code is invalid.”** If the verification code is expired → red text “Verification code is expired.”** If 2 password does not match → red text “Password does not match.”** If password not in range 6 - 20 characters → red text “Password must between 6 and 20 characters in length.”** If password only contains numbers or characters ( not include special characters) → red text “Password must have at least one number and one letter.”* After register successfully, no email ** The consumer will automatically be set connected with the Default merchant** If avt is skipped → the system will generate an image with the first character of the consumer’s first name and last name** User can skip for KYC level 2 verification !image-20201022-031422.png|width=1127,height=680!*Oct 26, 2020*: Remove buttons “Get Level 2 Verified” and “Skip Level 2 For Now”*Nov 12, 2020:* Add a button named “Explore Kanoo” after register successfully → click will move the user to Kanoo home page

title: Consumer App - Capture the last 4 digits of bank account for bank transfer via Plaid or Wire Transfer
description: +*AC:*+When loading money to Kash Kard from Bank Account via Wire Transfer or Plaid, we need to show the last 4 digits of bank on Transaction History scree (from left menu) and Transaction Detail screen.Format: Bank Account/ *xxxx

title: [BE] - Consumer App - Transaction detail
description: As a customer, I want to have the transaction detail screen, so that I can view all information related to that transaction.+*AC:*+I can open Transaction Detail from the transaction list screen. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1356|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1356|smart-link] ).* Title: *Transaction Type** Amount: ** Money: *-/+* *<money amount>* (Ex: + $500.00 / - $5,000.00)** Point: *-/+ <point number>* (Ex: - 10 Points / + 200 points) * Fee (if available): ** <money amount>* Warning frame (if the transaction is pending):** The transaction is loading money to Kash Kard via Wire Transfer:*** Warning message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“This transaction is still pending. Please come to your bank to finish this transaction.“_*{color}*** Instructions link:  open the instruction screen for Wire Transfer transaction ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|smart-link] )** The transaction is loading money to Kash Kard via Plaid:*** Warning message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“The transaction amount  is in progress. We will notify the transaction result shortly.“_*{color}*** Instructions link:  open the instruction screen for Wire Transfer transaction ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|smart-link] )** The transaction is withdrawing money from Kash Kard to bank account:*** Warning message:{color:#00b8d9}*_“This transaction is still pending. Please verify it by clicking the link that has been sent to your email.“_*{color}*** Instructions link:  open the instruction screen for Withdraw Transaction ([https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1436|smart-link] )* Reason frame (if the transaction is rejected/failed):** Failed/Rejected by remitter*** Message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cancelled by transaction remitter.“_*{color}** Failed/Rejected due to expired confirmation link (withdraw):*** Message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Cancelled due to expired confirmation link.“_*{color}** -Failed/Rejected due to any reasons from PrimeTrust-*** -Message:-{color:#ff5630}-Need to record failed/canceled reason provided by PrimeTrust.-{color}** Failed/Rejected due to undefined reason:*** Message: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Unknown error. Please contact your system administrator for support.“_*{color}* Transaction ID: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color}- Display an icon next to that allows user to add this transaction ID to clipboard.* Description: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color} - Refer to the excel file for description for each transaction category* Status: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color} - *Pending* / *Completed* / *Rejected** Transaction Date: {color:#ff5630}*Required*{color}{color:#ff5630} {color} - Format (Oct 06 at 06:49 PM)* Remitter* Beneficiary* Store: *Merchant Name** Name: *Gift Card Name* / *Coupon Name* / *Free Stuff Name (out of scope)** Project: *Project Name*+_Note:_+ * For the transactions Gift Card Redemption, Coupon Redemption, Free Stuff Redemption and Point Redemption, remitter/beneficiary and remitter card/beneficiary card does not have data, let shows Name and Store to replace:** Name: Gift Card Name, Coupon Name, Free Stuff Name. (except Point Redemption).** Store: Merchant Name (the store name which issues the gift card/coupon/free stuff)* If fee or any fields above does not record data, those fields should be gone.* For withdrawal feature, the link of email will expire after 24 hours. In case user do not takes any actions after 24 hours, this transaction will be failed (Reason: “_Cancelled due to expired confirmation link_.“, and also transfer money back to user kash kard..Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/]

title: [BE] - Send mail for failed transactions to admin group
description: Every time a transaction is failed, send an email to the admin group with the content below:The subject should be “Failed transaction warning“{color:#ff5630}*Dear ARM Admin,*{color}{color:#ff5630}*This is to inform you that a transaction has been failed. Please see the below details to take immediate action:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Transaction ID:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*User ID:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Transaction Time & Date:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Transaction Type:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Amount:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*User Name:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Beneficiary:*{color}{color:#ff5630}*Remitter:*{color}

title: [BE] - Consumer App -  Support users to resend the email of withdraw transaction
description: As a customer, I want to be resent the email for the withdrawal pending transaction if I cannot receive at first time.+*AC:*+* At Instruction screen (withdraw), show the message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Didn’t receive the instruction email?_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“* {color}and a button Resend.* On tapping the button:** The button should be disabled (grey out) for *60 seconds* (display countdown time beside “Resend“ word). I can tap it again to resend email only after *60 seconds*).** Show the toast message _“The email has been sent to your email address.“_** I can find that mail in my mailbox (main folder or junk folder).+_Note:_+This type of mail will expire within 24 hours. So if I click resend before it expires. The expire time will be reset and add more 24 hours once again since I receive the new mail.Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/]

title: [BE] - Consumer App - Remind users to settle the pending transactions
description: As a customer, I want to be reminded of the transactions which are pending in my transaction list.+*AC:*+*_Loading Kash Kard from bank account via Wire Transfer_*I should be reminded daily (after every 24 hours since I did the transaction) to take action for this type of pending transaction.* Push notification (for mobile app)** Title: *Remind to Settle Pending Transaction*** Content: “_A transaction of loading $_*_<amount>_* _to your Kash Kard is pending for your confirmation.”_** Logo: Remind icon** Click action: open Transaction Detail screen.* Email** Subject: *Remind to Settle Pending Transaction*** Content:** _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Dear_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*_\[Customer Name]_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_,_{color}** {color:#00b8d9}_A transaction of loading $_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_<amount>_*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _to your Kash Kard is pending for your confirmation._{color}** {color:#00b8d9}_Transaction ID:_{color}** {color:#00b8d9}_Sincerely,_{color}** {color:#00b8d9}*_\[tenant]_*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _Team_{color}** {color:#00b8d9}*_\[Tenant signature]_*{color}_“_*_Withraw Kash Kard to bank account_*I should be reminded to take action for this type of pending transaction at two period time:* First time: after 2 hours since I did the transaction.* Second time: before 2 hours when the confirmation link of email expires.** Push notification (for mobile app)*** Title: *Remind to Settle Pending Transaction**** Content: _“A transaction of withdrawing $_*_<amount>_* _from your Kash kard is pending for your confirmation.”_*** Logo: Remind icon*** Click action: open Transaction Detail screen.** Email*** Subject: *Remind to Settle Pending Transaction**** Content:*** _“_{color:#00b8d9}_Dear_ {color}{color:#00b8d9}*_\[Customer Name]_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}_,_{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}_A transaction of withdrawing $_{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_<amount>_*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _from your Kash Kard is pending for your confirmation._{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}_In order to confirm your withdrawal request, please verify it by clicking the link on the email which has been sent from PrimeTrust. Note: sometimes the emails might go to your junk folder._{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}_Transaction ID:_{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}_Sincerely,_{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}*_\[tenant]_*{color}{color:#00b8d9} _Team_{color}*** {color:#00b8d9}*_\[Tenant signature]_*{color}_“_

title: [BE] - Consumer App - Support user to cancel pending transactions
description: As a customer I want to have the ability to cancel a pending transaction of loading money to my KK from bank account or withdrawing to bank account whenever I want.+*AC:*+* I want to see a Cancel button on Transaction Detail screen.* On tapping Cancel button, show the confirmation pop-up:** The confirm message: {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Are you sure to cancel this transaction?_*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*”*{color}** Buttons:*** Yes: Close the pop-up, the transaction should be canceled. *** No: Close the pop-up, nothing’s changed.* After cancel** This transaction will be updated to Rejected status with reason _“Cancelled by transaction remitter“_. ** The Cancel button should be hidden on Transaction Detail screen (rejected).+_Note:_+ If I cancel order after the transaction is completed, after selecting Yes button, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_This transaction has been completed already._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}If I cancel order after the transaction is rejected or failed, after selecting Yes button, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_This transaction has been rejected already._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}If I cancel order after the transaction is being processed, after selecting Yes button, show the message {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_This transaction has been being processed already._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/]

title: Wallet - Edit Bank Account
description: As a customer, I want to have the ability to edit my bank account added to wallet.+*AC:*+* I can edit at Wallet screen and Withdraw screen (select bank).* On Bank Account card image, I want to have a three dots icon at the corner of card.* On tapping the icon, I can see the option Edit. Tapping Edit, show Edit Bank Account screen:** The UI of this screen should follow Add Bank Account screen.** All information should be populated from the info which I entered before while adding that bank account.** \[Confirm] button. On tapping: *** Edit from Wallet: I should be navigated back to Wallet screen (Pay Cards tab), show the toast message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your bank account was updated successfully\!“_*{color}_._ Wallet screen should be refreshed and I can see my bank account edited.*** Edit from Withdraw screen: I should be navigated back to Withdraw screen, show the toast message {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your bank account was updated successfully\!“ ._*{color} Wallet screen should be refreshed and I can see my bank account edited.+_Validation Rules:_+* I can edit bank account no matter if that has transaction or not.* Edit rules for all fields should be same as add bank account.

title: [Android] - Entertainment - Store Details
description: +*AC:*+* On selecting any stores from Offers tab of Marketplace screen, I can open the store detail screen of that store.* On this screen, I can see some below info:** Business logo image** Entertainment logo** Business name** Description.** Available Offers: *** Display the list of offers availables of the current store. The coupon which can be redeemable and the coupon which has been redeemed already must be distinguished.*** I can tap any offers to open the offer detail screen. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3452|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3452|smart-link] )** Store Information:*** Store address: Display the address and an icon which I can tap to open the map application with the location defined on it.*** Phone number: Display the phone number and an icon which I can tap to open the phone app to contact the store.+*_Mockup:_*+Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/61c3b95a-6366-4162-b5a0-f1a8e62d484a/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/61c3b95a-6366-4162-b5a0-f1a8e62d484a/|smart-link]  Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/screen/6570a970-4bd2-4738-828f-594c6aca6290/|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Entertainment - Offers tab - Home and 4 categories
description: As a consumer, I want to be able to view and collect the offers (coupons) of merchants from the third party (Entertainment).+*_Mockup:_*+* On Marketplace screen, I want to have another tab named *Offers* after Gift Cards tab.* On this tab, I can see the list of stores from Entertainment site.* I can see the list of main business categories displayed by icons, I can tap to filter the list of stores below:** Home: Display all stores from all categories** Dining** Shopping** Things To Do** Travel* Beside the icons of categories, I can see a star icon. On tapping, I can open the tab screen where contains all offer that I have saved. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3471|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-3471|smart-link] )* I can search the offer by offer description, store name. If searching has no results, show the message at center *_“No offers found“_** For each store , I can see some below info:** Business logo image** Store name** Store address** The current number of all offers (from the current store)** I can see the distance from my location to the store address.* The list of stores should be sort by the nearest location (from top downwards)* On selecting any stores, I can open the store detail screen. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1445|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1445|smart-link]) Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/5c393028-123e-4969-ad2d-92b79bcf2cc1/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/31ea19e1-27f6-43b6-8385-fee9425427b6-64b9/screen/5c393028-123e-4969-ad2d-92b79bcf2cc1/|smart-link] Web:   [https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/56fedcd6-27b3-4b7e-b473-946f9ecba138-03ad/|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Update Instructions screen for Payment Transactions
description: +*AC:*+* Update UI** Remove the blue icon at the end of each notification item.* Update content and action for some notifications of payment transactions.** *Load money from Bank via Wire Transfer (Success Pending screen)**** I can open this screen from the transaction list screen.*** This is instruction for customers to complete the transaction. Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction or they can open this when viewing the transaction detail in the Transactions screen or Notifications screen.*** !1602563449168.JPEG|width=540,height=1110!***Updated Message:* {color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*_Please transfer money to the below bank account to receive money on your Kashkard._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}*** Below the screen will have the text *_“Your wire instructions might be difference from the above. If you have any doubts or questions please verify your instructions with your account representative or_*{color:#00b8d9} {color}[*_support@primetrust.com_*|mailto:support@primetrust.com]*_”._* On tapping, it will open the mail application, depending on the system default behavior of user’s device.** *Load money from Bank via Plaid (Success Pending screen)**** This is the message that we show to customers about this transaction and they don’t need to take any action for this type. Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction.*** !1602563449180.JPEG|width=540,height=1110!***Updated Message:* {color:#00b8d9}*_“The amount transaction is in progress. We will notify the transaction results shortly.”_*{color}** *Withdraw money from Kash Kard to bank account.* *** Customers will see this screen at the final step when they process the transaction or they can open this when viewing the transaction detail in the Transactions screen or Notifications screen.!1602564700377.JPEG|width=50.96006144393242%!***_Updated Message:_* {color:#00b8d9}*_“In order to confirm your withdrawal request, please verify it by clicking the link that we sent to your email. Note: sometimes our emails might go to your junk folder.“_*{color}* Please refer to the current notification that we have in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KAR/pages/210173981/Push+Notification+on+Apps|smart-link] to define the modified content and action (click to view the detail).{color:#ff991f}+*_Note_*+{color}{color:#ff991f}*In milestone 1, these screens can be opened by clicking the item on Transaction List screen.*{color}Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/]XD: KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2042\\KP-1394 Payment Trasaction Update\\Transaction History.xd

title: [Backend] - Consumer Apps - Buy Product - Get  the Google address on making Delivery order.
description: As a customer, I want be able to enter exactly my delivery address while ordering, so that the shipper can find my location and deliver the order more easily and conveniently.+*AC:*+* On Delivery Information form, when entering the address, I want to be suggested the list of addresses from Google.* I can see where is the most exact address that I want to select as my delivery address.* The address should be saved correctly on Order screen (consumer app, POS app, Kard Order Delivery app).

title: [Backend] Order Delivery App - Order Detail screen
description: +*AC:*+* On tapping any orders on Orders List from any tabs, I can open Order Detail screen.* On this screen:||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*|||* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions on map* Map* Order detail information.* \[PICK UP] button: On tapping** The button is disappeared and reaplaced by \[COMPLETE ORDER] button.** The status is updated to Shipping.|* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions* Map* Order detail information.* \[COMPLETE ORDER] button. On tapping this:** *Scan QR Code:* There are three options shown:*** SCAN TO CONFIRM: The customer presents me the QR code of order to scan. After scanning successfully, show the toast message _“Order Completed\!“_ and the status on the screen auto-updated to Completed.*** CONFIRM WITHOUT SCANNING: I can skip scanning action and completed the order by taking note (photo or text). After taking note successfully, I should be navigated back to Order Detail screen, show the toast message _“Order Completed\!“_ and the status on the screen auto-updated to Completed.*** CANCEL: Close the Action Sheet, nothing’s changed.** *Leave At Door*: Show the screen to take a photo and note. On this screen, I can take note if I want or I can skip this action. Below is DONE button, on tapping I can complete this type of order and will be navigated to Order Detail screen again (Completed status).|* Order number* Order status* Delivery Type: *Scan QR Code* / *Leave At Door** Delivery Time/Address* A button to show directions* Map* Order detail information.* Note (if available).|+_Note:_+* Show Direction button:** This button is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can tap this to open the map app and that app shows me direction automatically.** This button is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). I have to contact customer to get the correct address and open the map application manually and find way to get there.* Map:** The app is displayed when the delivery address is correct (existing on Google map). I can see on the map the delivery address is marked by red icon.** The map is hidden when the delivery address is incorrect (not existing on Google map). In this case, below the address I can see a red warning text _“_{color:#ff5630}*_The address cannot be found._*{color}_“._* Note: This part can the note of text or photo depending which type I take note while completing order. If I can skip this action, this should show nothing here. The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/68bb31c5-0956-41d7-abad-9c66530bb979-3de8/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470|https://xd.adobe.com/view/68bb31c5-0956-41d7-abad-9c66530bb979-3de8/?mv=product&mv2=accc&product=Creative+Cloud+Desktop&product-version=5.3.1.470]

title: [BE] - VisiPay - Users - Display Transaction History for Consumer
description: As Visipay Admin I want to view the transaction history of each consumer to be the same as that customer sees on the apps. This will include all transactions sorted by latest to oldest defined in [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1356|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1356|smart-link] * Display the transaction history view for each user.* The transaction table should include:** Transaction ID** Transaction Category** Status** Beneficiary** Beneficiary Kard (Format: Kash Kard/*1234)** Remitter** Remitter Kard (Format: Kash Kard/*1234)** Amount** Fee** Transaction Date* On Transaction screen of a user, I can search with transaction ID, remitter and beneficiary.* Remove the rule of selecting timeframe to filter within 3 months.

title: iOS  - Update UI of Payment Complete screen after buying product by money or point
description: Requirement: https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1367

title: [Android] - KardPOS - Update Order Status
description: As a merchant staff, I want to be able to update status for each order, so that delivery staff (shipper) can know that which order is ready to deliver to customer.+*AC:*+* On Order Detail screen, I can update order status:** When the status is New, I can update to Preparing only.** When the status is Preparing, I can update to Ready only.** When the status is Ready, *** Pickup orders: I can update to Completed by two ways:**** Scan QR code: the customer will present the QR code of their order to me, after scanning succesfully, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*.**** Manually: in case the customer forgets to bring their device, I can require them to provide their personal info (phone number, ID card…) and allow them to pick up their order without scanning. I can take note (write and take a photo) to keep track or skip, after that, navigate me to Order Detail screen (Completed status) and show the toast message *_“Order Completed\!“_*. I can see the note below the Order Detail screen.*** Delivery orders: KardPOS staff cannot update anymore. The shipper can see the Ready order at Ready tab of Order Delivery app and pick to deliver.* When I update status an order on my device, that should be synced up to the other devices used by the other staffs.* The UI of updating status should follow Action Sheet like Order Delivery app (the previous sprint).+_Note:_+* Pickup button is only enabled when the status of Pickup order is Ready. Otherwise, it will be grey out.* The mamximum input at Note field is 500 characters including space.* If an order is updated by two staffs at the same time, who goes after will get a message pop-up *_“This order has been processed by another staff.“_* and update the status to the latest status of that order.+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3351a52a-7f61-4082-be50-5bac222f125d-6602/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3351a52a-7f61-4082-be50-5bac222f125d-6602/|smart-link] +*XD:*+ KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2050\\KP-1371 \[Android] - KardPOS - Update Order Status

title: Order Delivery App - Complete Order - Support New Options
description: As a delivery staff (shipper) I want to be able to complete an delivery order in My Orders list with below ways.* For order that customer selects “Leave At Door” option, I can change the order to Completed status myself without requesting customer to present QR code of the order.* For order that customer select “Scan QR Code” to confirm order, I can ask customer to present QR code to confirm or I can skip this step if there are some certain situations that customer does not have the QR code of that time and I can save a note or capture screenshot of some information into the order for this case.+*AC:*+ [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Order Delivery App - Order List screen
description: As a shipper, I want to view the list of orders which the status is Ready, so that I can know which order is ready for me to deliver.+*AC:*+* After login, I should be navigated to Order List screen. (remove the old Home screen).* On Order List screen:** Change Close button to Log Out button and change Filter icon to Scan icon. On tapping Scan icon, show the scanning screen, the shipper can scan QR code of the order to show Order Detail screen. After scanning, the shipper can tap COMPLETE ORDER button to complete order right away without scanning anymore, at that time show the toast message _“Order Completed\!“_ and the status on the screen auto-updated to Completed.** Separate the screen into 3 tabs named *_Ready_*_,_ *_Shipping_* _and_ *_Completed_*||*Ready*||*Shipping*||*Completed*||| |* Show the number badge on the tab zone, this represents for the number of orders which I have to deliver customer, for each order updated to Completed, this number will go down.| ||* Show all Ready orders of Delivery type.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Shipping orders picked by me from Ready tab.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.|* Show all Completed orders (picked and shipped) by me.Lazy loading: It should get 10 orders at the first time I access the list. When I scroll to the end of the list, it should load 10 more orders.||* Search: customer name, phone number, order number and address.|* Search: *same as Ready list.*|* Search: *same as Ready list.*||* Filter:** Delivery Type: *All* / *Leave At Door* / *Scan QR Code*. The default value is *All*.** Date: date range. The default value is *Select a date range*.|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*|* Filter: *same as Ready list.*||* Sorting: by the oldest one (late delivered) to the newest one from top downwards. (past orders to future orders).|* Sorting: *same as Ready list.*|* Sorting: the list will be sorted by completed date. (which one is completed first will be at the top).||* For each order, show:** Customer name** Phone number** Order number** Delivery time:*** This is black normally if the time is after the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 05:13 PM).*** This is highlighted if the time is before the current date time. (Ex: My current date time is 10/09/2020 04:13 PM, and the delivery date time shows 10/09/2020 03:13 PM).** Delivery Type: *_Scan QR Code_* / *_Leave At Door_*** \[PICK UP] button. On clicking:*** The current list should be reloaded.*** The order should be moved to Shipping tab. *** The number badge on Shipping tab is increased. *** The other shipper cannot see this order on his/her app.*** Push notification on consumer apps.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.|* For each order, show: *same as Ready list without any buttons*.||* When the other staff updates any orders to Ready on KardPOS, that should be synced to this list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1371|smart-link] ).| | ||* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|* Show Order Detail screen on tapping any orders from the list. ( [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1399|smart-link] )|+_Note:_+* The customer name should be displayed maximum 2 lines and show the pickup / delivery address fully.* Search orders:** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.** Delivery Address: I can search with full address or the phrase contained in the address.** Order Number:  I can search with full order number or the string of number contained in the order number.** If no orders found, I want to see the message {color:#00b8d9}*_“No orders found._*{color}{color:#00b8d9}*“*{color}. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020).* For each order shown on the list:** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer app.** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.** If the customer name is long, use ellipsis, make sure the name only shown in a line.* In case there are two shippers tapping \[PICKUP] button at the same time on Ready tab, the one goes after will see a message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order has been picked up by the other staff.“_*{color}* For Scanning feature on this app (from Home screen and Shipping Order Detail screen: if scanning the QR code of order which status is New, Preparing or Ready, show the error message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“This order is not available for delivery.“_*{color}+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/3448a0db-2c2d-47fd-87c9-9a54fa1b6b44-611b/screen/bdb94a9f-5153-49f2-975a-be97a6614481|https://xd.adobe.com/view/3448a0db-2c2d-47fd-87c9-9a54fa1b6b44-611b/screen/bdb94a9f-5153-49f2-975a-be97a6614481|smart-link]

title: [Android] - Transactions - Combine 3 tabs into one list
description: User can see the transactions screen by tapping on the Transactions on the left menu. We need to combine 3 tabs of this screen into 1 list.+*AC*+* The transaction list should include all transactions of all statuses: pending, completed, rejected. The list should contain all transaction categories as current.* Each transaction will have below information in the list.** Transaction Date/Time** Amount** Fee (if available):*** We will show fee for the transaction types below:**** Card Load:***** Load money to  Kash Kard via cash at Merchant Name***** Load money to Kash Kard from Credit Card***** Load money to Kash Kard from Bank Account (Plaid and Wire Transfer)**** Transfer Money: only show fee for sender, not receiver**** Withdraw (cash and bank account)* Transaction Category** Remitter** Beneficiary** Store** Name** Project (for Cause2Fund transactions)** Status (icon)* The transactions should be group by month. All transactions that have the same created month will be grouped in the same group. Group name is the month with format Month Year(Ex: October 2020). We don’t need feature to expand/collapse the group.* Sort: by created date* Filter:** Status: *All* (default value) / *Rejected* / *Pending* / *Completed*. ** Date range: Default is empty (“*Select date range*”). Format MM/DD/YYYY. Start date must to the same or before the end date. This validation rule should be control by the date picker meaning user cannot select the invalid date range.** Filter icon should be highlighted when being used.* Lazy loading: Load 20 transactions at the first time and load more 20 items when user scroll to the end of the list.* See the format for each transaction in the UI but refer to the excel file for the value of each transaction type.* When no transactions recorded (with a new account), show the message at center {color:#00b8d9}_“No transactions found“_{color}_._ This message should be used even when filter has no results.* Click on an item of this list will navigate user to the transaction detail screen. This AC will be handled on [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1512|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-1512|smart-link] +_Note:_+For the transaction Coupon Redemption, there are two cases:* Case 1: Consumer use the Buy X Get Y, the amount of this transaction should be empty.* Case 2: Consumer use the percentage, fixed amount coupon, the amount of this transaction should be displayed as exactly the amount while making payment. Mockup: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8dd6873b-7a54-496a-be8d-6f33904d48f9-d885/]

title: [Mobile] Update location request popup behavior

title: [Android] Enhance the login with Fingerprint/Face ID feature
description: AC:# The “Log in with Face ID” popup should be displayed right after the users open the Log in the screen if this feature is enabling.# The “Log in with Face ID” popup should not open if users just logout manually and they have been redirected to login screen because they want to logout, if we open the popup automatically, it can cause user login again# This feature should work in both cases that user log out manually or they are kicked out because of their token is expired/invalid# Login with Face ID / Fingerprint should be hidden if a mobile device does not support that feature in default settings.# Enable this even if users have not activated this feature## When users click on the Face ID button while they have not turned it on, display a message to show them how to turn it on “Sign in to the app to set up the \[Face ID/Touch ID/Fingerprint]“### If user click cancel on this popup => Do nothing### If user click OK, after user login, we will navigate him to Setting screen

title: Mobile Apps - Login - Timeout
description: I don’t want to be logged out after a period of timeout as the current way and my login can be kept until I want to log out actively.AC:# When user login into the mobile app, the login API should return a *refresh-token* along with the token# Whenever the user’s token is expired and they call any API from the mobile app, this API should return with an HTTP code 401 (Unauthorized) along with a statusCode is “expired_token“.# In the case above, the mobile app will use the refresh-token to renew the user’s token and use this token to call the previous API again.

title: Backend - Save Shopping Cart
description: As a customer I want to be able to save products to my shopping cart to order then.+*Acceptance Criteria:*+* Show the toast message “{color:#00b8d9}*_Product added to cart_*{color}“ every time adding product to cart successfully.* Cart Icon (Home screen):** Users should able to see the cart icon on the home screen.*** The number badge on the cart icon is the total products on cart. The maximum number displayed here is 99+.*** The number badge will be refreshed when the home screen is opened*** If only number is refreshing, user should not see the loading circle, it is a bad UX, just call the API to refresh and update the UI when it done** Tapping the cart icon will navigate the user to the “Cart“ screen.* I can select and save products of different merchants into my Cart.* I can select a product multiple times to add to my Cart.* Cart is saved on server and I can see it after that on all devices.* I can open Product Detail screen from the Cart screen (for product including or not including options).* For each product on the cart, I want to see:** Product name** Product image** Quantity field to edit** Original price** Discount price (for a single item)** Delete icon: On clicking this icon, the app shows a confirmation pop-up (the pop-up template depends on mobile platform) saying _“Are you sure to remove this product from your cart?“_ with two option buttons OK and Cancel.*** OK: Close the pop-up and remove the pop-up.*** Cancel: Close the pop-up and nothing’s changed.** Options for a product (if available)* Cart should be update when:** I added new product from store detail to my card** I update the number of product that I want to buy on cart detail screen:** I remove any product on cart detail screen** Product of a merchant on my cart should be reset after I buy them* I can see Checkout button for each merchant on Cart like the web app is doing.* This feature is applied for all kard-based mobile/web apps.* Recent purchased history is out of scope of this story.+_Validation Rules:_+* If there is no products in the cart, show the message at center of screen _“Your Cart Is Empty.“_* For the product which has options, user can tap on that product (image or option) to edit options of that one.* User can edit the number of a product they want to buy:** By (+) or (-) buttons. User can only decrease minimum to 1 and increase maximum to the current inventory number of a product.** By enter manually. If they enter the number larger than the current inventory number of that product, show the toast message saying _“_{color:#ff5630}_This product has_ {color}{color:#ff5630}*_x_* {color}{color:#ff5630}_items left in stock._{color}_“_, then the number user enters will be auto-changed to *x*. (*x: the current inventory number of a product*).* When user is at Product screen, the merchant admin disables any products, user adds that product to cart, show the toast message “{color:#ff5630}_This product is not available currently._{color}“* If the cart on mobile app and web app has 3 items: ** User removes all 3 items on mobile app:*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart Detail page, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** If they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}_._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User removes 1 of 3 items on mobile app*** On web app, if they click Checkout button at Cart page, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely*** On web app, if they click Checkout button, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if they click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** User does payment for all 3 items on mobile app completely*** On web app, if they update any item on web app (edit number, change options, …), show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“._ After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.*** On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up _“_{color:#00b8d9}*_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._*{color}_“_. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return empty. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.** -User does payment for 1 of 3 items on mobile app completely-*** -On web app, if they click Checkout button on web app, show the notification message pop-up- -_“_-{color:#00b8d9}*-_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._-*{color}-_“._- -After user close the pop-up, the Cart page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.-*** -On web app, if click Make Payment button at Confirm Purchase step, show the notification message pop-up- -_“_-{color:#00b8d9}*-_Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment._-*{color}-_“_--. After user close the pop-up, user should be navigated back to Cart page, that page should be reloaded and return 2 items left to be same as mobile. For the opposite case, it’ll be the same.-* When user opens Shopping Cart from Home screen or tapping Checkout button on Shopping Cart screen , if there is any products is changed before they do payment:** *_Case 1: For products which changed or affected by Product Image / Product Title / Option / Product Description / Inventory Number (out of stock or not enough in stock) or the category containing product deleted by merchant admin._**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** After close the pop-up:**** The products which have been changed should be removed.**** Keep the products which have not been changed anything.** *_Case 2:  For products which changed or affected by Price or Tax_**** Show the message pop-up: {color:#00b8d9}*_“Your cart has been changed. Please check again before proceeding payment.”_*{color}*** Show the list of products normally.*** Update the latest price and tax for products which are changed about price and tax.XD for Kard app: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/5688e576-1ee5-4bf4-af68-b035af2b8d0b-03db/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/5688e576-1ee5-4bf4-af68-b035af2b8d0b-03db/]Git: \\KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2036\\KP-988 Save Shopping CartPlease note that the shopping cart button on the left menu is out of scope of this ticket

title: Android - Delete Credit Card
description: As a customer, I want to be able to delete my credit card which I have added to my wallet.+*AC*+* I login to web app and open Wallet screen.* On Wallet screen, I can see the credit cards (assuming that I have added them before)* On the top-right corner of card image, I can see the More options (three dots icon). On tapping, I can see Delete option:** iOS: use Action Sheet** Android: same as design* When I choose Delete, I want to see a confirmation pop-up saying _“Are you sure you want to delete this card?“_ with two buttons OK and Cancel.  The pop-up format depends on each mobile platform.** OK: show the toast message saying _“Delete successfully\!“_, the card is only removed from user’s wallet (soft delete).** Cancel: close the pop-up.+_Validation rules:_+I can delete the credit card if that card has transactions or not. After deleting, make sure the card still saved in database.If I add a credit card which was deleted, that card should be considered as a new card, I cannot see any transactions which I did before.Git: KardSys\\Kard\\05-Export\\Sprint-2039\\KP-983 Delete Credit Card

title: [Android] Login screen - UI-UX enhancement
description: AC:# The current message when the user enters an incorrect password is unfriendly and insecure. Update it to “You have entered an invalid username or password. Please try again.”# Update the maximum attempt to 20 and make it configurable on the server-side. (This may need an API story).# In case of user login with incorrect username or password, do not display “You have entered an invalid username or password. Attempted 1/5“, just display “You have entered an invalid username or password. Please try again“ instead.# Update the UI for login screen as Kanoo app## “Login with Face ID” text should be more easy to see. User the same icon with the Kanoo app## Remove the button “Sign Up” and make Text “Register here“ on the string “New user? Register here“ clickable and navigate the user to Register screen## Remove the text “By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy“. That text should be displayed on the Register screen only# Register screen: Move the title “Sign up to Kard“ up to the navigation bar and rename it to “Become a member“. Do the same thing on other steps of registering.# On Set PIN step, the PIN should be hidden with dots# Remove the uploading avatar step[https://xd.adobe.com/view/d8ff02ae-701c-4ea3-9638-932d0392df5c-8dac/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/d8ff02ae-701c-4ea3-9638-932d0392df5c-8dac/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Consumer App - Enhance Store Detail screen
description: As a merchant admin, I want my store detail screen to be displayed as three tabs (Home / Products / Gift Cards) so that my customers can view and purchase more easily and conveniently.+*AC:*+Display the screen has three tabs.*_Home_*On this tab, I want to display as same as Nearby tab (refer to the current Nearby tab of Store Detail screen):* The UI will be the same.* Remove Buy Gift Card button.*_Products_*On this tab, I can see:* The list of all products of a specific merchant, the products here are from the connect category of a product belonging to the default connect zone which is being active. This list will be shown as grid view mode.* Each product being shown here must belong to at least one connect category of any connect zones and the connect zone must be active and set as default as well.* I can filter product with category by the filter icon on the Search field:** On clicking the icon, show the list of product categories screen.** I can select/deselect one or multiple categories to filter.** For each selected category, it will be checked on the box.** I can tap the Clear button to clear all filters. On clicking, all selected categories will be unselected, I can select other categories and get back to the Products tab.** The filter icon should be bold and colored if I am using the filter.** Keep the filtering results screen when:*** Returning Nearby tab from any store details screen.*** Switch between tabs Nearby, Online and Shopping.* By default, I will see the list of products from all categories (*All*).* For each product, I want to see:** Discount percentage (if available)** Product image** Product name:*** Show maximumly in 2 lines, use an ellipsis if the product name is too long.** Product price:*** Show including the original price and the discount price (if available)*** Show maximumly in 1 line, use an ellipsis if the price is too long.* On tapping a product, I can see the product detail screen.* I can search product by product name, product category name and tags:** I can search with any words, characters or phrases contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Show all results if searching by blank characters or clearing keywords.* I can sort the product list by:** Latest: sort product list by the latest created date** Price:*** Low to High*** High to Low.* By default, the list of products will be sorted by discounted price (low to high), if multiple products have the same price, they will be sorted by alphabet (A-Z).* If no products are available or no matched searching/filtering results, display {color:#00b8d9}*_“No products found.“_*{color}.*_Gift Cards_*On this tab, I want to display all my gift cards, same as when I tap Buy Gift Card button (refer to the Buy Gift Card button at Nearby tab of the current Store Detail screen).The list of gift cards displayed are the gift cards belonging to the konnect category of gift card from the konnect categories of GC. This is the current rule.+*Mockup:*+ Mobile: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/956224f9-0305-4aef-a244-b7be0dd4b8ad-c031/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/956224f9-0305-4aef-a244-b7be0dd4b8ad-c031/|smart-link]  Web: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/8e9b834b-a12a-490d-8b26-2f725cfa8ca0-dbc8/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/8e9b834b-a12a-490d-8b26-2f725cfa8ca0-dbc8/|smart-link]

title: [Backend] Visikard Admin - Manage Product Categories
description: As a System Admin, I want to be able to manage the list of default product categories and also support a tenant to manage their category list.+*AC:*+On the left menu, I click an item named Product Categories to open Product Categories page.The page will be seperated into 2 tabs: *System* and *Tenants*On System tab, I can see:* *New Category* button: On clicking New Product Category pop-up is opened, on this pop-up:||*Fields*||*Description*||*Display*||*Required*||*Validation*|||*Name*|I can enter category name.|Textbox|YesIf Name field is missing, show red error message {color:#ff5630}*_“Name is required“_*{color}|Name is unique.Max length: 50 characters.Error message: {color:#ff5630}*_“This name already exits.“_*{color}||*Tags*|I can enter tags for the new category. After each tag, I can seperate by hitting Enter.|Textbox|No|No|||*Buttons*||*Click to action*|||Save Changes|Close the dialog and add new category to the table.||Cancel|Close the dialog and the action is cancelled.|* Clone for Tenant button: On clicking, show Import Category pop-up:** Tenant field: displaying the list of tenants (*Kard, GreenCom, HYT, …*) as a drop-down list to select.** The list of categories are displayed, each item will have a checkbox, I can search, select one by one / multiple / all.** Buttons:*** Clone: close the pop-up, the list of selected categories will be cloned for the selected tenant. *** Cancel: close the pop-up, the action is cancelled.* Below the *New Category* button, there’s a table of created categories including columns:** Name: displaying category name** Tags: displaying tags of the category** Action:||*Buttons*||*Click to action*|||Edit ({color:#ff5630}*this option is not displayed on Tenant tabs*{color})|Edit Category pop-up is opened. On this pop-up, the UI and function are as same as when creating a new category, but the fields are populated from the current info.||Remove|Remove Category pop-up is opened:* Message: *_“Are you sure to remove the category \[category name]?“_** Buttons:** Remove: Close the pop-up and remove the category.** No: Close the pop-up and the action is cancelled.|* I can search category on the table by name and tags.On Tenants tab, I can see* The list of categories of all tenants have been cloned from system.* The list of categories are displayed as a table including below columns:** Name: displaying category name** Tags: displaying tags of the category** Tenant: displaying tenant name** Action:*** Remove* I can filter the list by tenant.+_Note:_+On System tab:* When system admin adds a new category,{color:#00b8d9} *it will not impact to the list of other tenants.*{color}* When system admin edits or removes a category, {color:#00b8d9}*it will impact to the list of tenants, the list displayed on consumer web / app.*{color}On Tenants tab: When system admin removes a category, {color:#00b8d9}*it will not impact to the list of other tenants or system (on System tab)*{color}. (For ex: System admin removes a category of GreenCom tenant on Tenants tab, there is only tenant admin of GreenCom cannot see it anymore).On the table of product categories of each tab:* Name and Tags should be displayed maximum only one line * If Name and Tags are too long, there should have ellipsis, if admin hovers the mouse cursor on it, he can see the full Name and Tags.In case if there’s not any categories or no results of searching, show the message *_“No Categories Found.“_*+*Mockup:*+ [https://xd.adobe.com/view/b338abc6-9c2f-4b5e-9930-3950981bf1a8-e66b/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/b338abc6-9c2f-4b5e-9930-3950981bf1a8-e66b/|smart-link]

title: [Search] Remove "View More button" - Add scroll bar
description: As a consumer, I would like to show the scroll bar when the list of people/merchants is very long. Besides, please also remove the View More button for both People/Business tab, it means when the user scrolls the page to the bottom, the list will be loaded more without the user click on the View More button!image-2020-09-07-14-35-26-533.png|width=200,height=183!

title: iOS - Receive Notification for Status Update of Order
description: As a customer, I want receive the notification every time my order status is updated so that I can track my order more conveniently.+*AC:*+* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the push notification which says “Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“.* I can tap on the notification to navigate to the Order Detail screen* The notification is saved on Notification List screen.

title: Order Process App - Scan Order
description: As a staff using Order Process App, I want to scan the order to complete any orders without searching it on Order List screen.+*AC:*+* On Home screen, I can click Scan Order button and it’ll open the scan screen (camera).* The text shown on scan screen: “_Scan QR to View Order”_.* Depending on the status of order displayed on customer app, I can or cannot scan that order.* After scanning, the order detail screen will be opened.* Tapping on Confirm button at the bottom, Success screen will be shown (Order Completed).* Tap close button on Success screen, user will be navigated to Order Detail screen (the status is Completed).*Note:* If I scan order from Order Detail screen, the text shown on scan screen should be “_Scan to Complete Order_“

title: Android - KardPOS app - Display order status
description: As a staff using KardPOS app, I want the created orders to display the status so that I can track and manage them more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on the orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*.* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever the order status is updated.* I want the status to display on both Orders screen (Orders List: Processing and Completed tabs) and Order Detail screen. * Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab: only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.{color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at Completed tab all the time._*{color}

title: Android - Display order status
description: As a customer, I want my created orders to display the status so that I can track the processing of my order more conveniently and easily.+*AC:*+* There are 5 statuses that can be displayed on my orders: *_New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed_*.* After a new order is created, the status is New.* The rest of statuses are auto-synced from Order Process App whenever my order status is updated.* I want the status to display on both Orders screen (Orders List: Processing and Completed tabs) and Order Detail screen. Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab:  only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app. updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.{color:#ff5630}*_Note: For the Pay Now orders, they will be displayed at Completed tab all the time._*{color}

Each tab will contain all the orders which the type is Pickup or Delivery.** For Processing tab: displaying the orders which the status is New, Preparing, Ready, Shipping.** For Completed tab:  only displaying the orders which the status is Completed.* The list of orders are sorted by created date as the current sorting behavior on the app, updating order status does not affect the sorting rule here.

title: API - Send email to customer after creating order successfully mobile/web app
description: As a customer, after creating a new order on mobile/web app, I want the system to send me an email about confirming my order created successfully.+*AC:*+* I can create a new order on mobile / web app.* After making payment for my order, I can check my mailbox and receive a new email.* Email Structure:** Subject: Order Confirmation \[Order ID]** Content:_“Dear \[Customer Name],__We are delighted to inform that your order \[Order ID] at \[Business Name] has been received._ _You can check your order detail as information below:”_ * I want to see my order detail displayed as a table below. * Below the order detail table, I want to see the message _“Click_ +_here_+ _to check your order detail at HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.“_ attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Orders page of the web app of corresponding tenant. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before._“Sincerely,__HYT/Kard/GreenCom/GreenLife.”_* Display the merchant’s logo image and contact information (business name, email address, phone number) at the bottom so that I can contact if I have any problems with the current order.*_Note: The email template is used correponding to the template of tenant web app that I am using._*

title: API - Buy Product Flow - Redeem Points -  Update UI of Order Detail screen.
description: As a customer, after buying product with points, I want to see my order detail with one more row displaying Point which I has redeemed.*+AC:+*I open Order Detail after buying product.On Order Detail screen, I can see one more row named *Point Redemption* with the amount.The *Point Redemption* row is under Gift Card row.+Validation rules:+* The *Point Redemption* row always shown no matter if I redeem points while buying product or not.* The amount of Point Redemption must be displayed as same as when I buy product.

title: BE - ARM - Monthly Subscription - Change Email Content of Expiration Remind
description: As a merchant admin, I want to receive an email from system every time my ARM account is about to expire.+*AC:*+* My account is about to expire in \[n] day. (n can be configurable).* The system will auto send an email to me.* The template of email should follow the current style of email sent from ARM.!image-20200911-044805.png|width=618,height=350!* Change currency from B$ to $.* Email content is similar to the current one:!image-20200911-033933.png|width=372,height=229!Subject: _\[Kard ARM] Your Merchant Account is about to expire_* _Dear \[Merchant Name],_* _We would like to inform that your subscription package \[package name] is about to expire on \[date] (x day(s) left). The system will auto-charge a monthly subscription fee from your kash kard then so that you can continue using Kard ARM services. Please maintain your kash kard balance ready for the fee, otherwise, your merchant account will get deactivated._** _Current kash kard balance: $x.xx_ ** _Monthly subscription fee: $yy.yy_ (This fee about depends on the subscription package which the merchant registered.).* _Arm Corporate Office__4480H South Cobb__Drive #321Smyrna, GA 30080_* _All Arm emails will be sent from our_ [_support@kardsys.com_|mailto:support@kardsys.com] _domains to your registered email address. We will never contact you from any other addresses._

title: API - Receive Notification for Status Update of Order
description: As a customer, I want receive the notification every time my order status is updated so that I can track my order more conveniently.+*AC:*+* After creating an order on my app, I go to Orders screen.* I click my order to view Order Detail screen.* On Order Detail screen, I can see a new line named Status, it’s left-aligned on the screen.* Below the Status line, I can see my order status (New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed), it’s also left-aligned on the screen.* I also want my order status also displayed on Orders screen.* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the notification by 2 ways:** Push notification: “Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“. When I tap on that one, it’ll open Order Detail screen correspondingly. This only applied for mobile platform:** Email:*** I want to see the message _“Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“_ with my order detail displayed below this message.*** I can see my order detail displayed as a table, below this table I want to see the message _“Click_ {color:#00b8d9}+*_here_*+{color}{color:#00b8d9} {color}_to view your order at \[tenant].“_, attach the hyperlink to “here“ word. On clicking, I can be directed to Order Detail page of the web app. I can be required to login if I haven’t login before.*** _“Sincerely,_*** _\[tenant]  team.”_

description: As a customer, I want receive the notification every time my order status is updated so that I can track my order more conveniently.+*AC:*+* Every time my order status is updated by the staff, I can receive the push notification which says “Your order \[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been updated to \[status].“.* I can tap on the notification to navigate to the Order Detail screen* The notification is saved on Notification List screen.

title: Order Process App - Home Screen
description: As a staff using Order Process App, I want to see Home screen with some buttons so that I can proceed more actions afterwards.+*AC:*+* I can see the app name displayed at the top.* There are two buttons:** Scan Order: open Scan screen.** Orders: On clicking, it’ll open Orders List screen which shows all the orders created from consumer apps.* I can log out with LogOut icon at the top-right corner of the screen.XD link: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/caa0532a-e4b3-429a-8d2b-83a15110cfdf/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/caa0532a-e4b3-429a-8d2b-83a15110cfdf/]

title: Order Process App - Order Detail and Update Order Status
description: As a staff of the store, I want to have a screen named “Order Detail“ for each order on Order Process app, so that I can check with customer which items they bought and perform deliver order as exact as possible.+*AC:*+* On Order Detail screen, I can tap on any orders to open Order Detail screen.* On Order Detail screen:** Title: Order Detail** I can see customer name, phone number and call icon. On clicking Call icon, it’ll open the dialog of system which allows me to choose an external app to call customer (Phone default app, Skype, Zalo, etc…).** I can see order number, order status, payment status, order type, address:*** Order Status: All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed. I can update status on this screen. (use bottom sheet style here)*** Payment status: Paid / Unpaid.*** Order Type: Delivery / Pickup*** Delivery/Pickup Address: show exactly the address which customer has inputted while buying product on app or the address where the other staff created the order at the store.** Below the address, show the map with the defined address above. (only for Delivery orders).** I can see the list of items of the order below:*** Quantity, Items, Unit Price and Total Price for each item*** Tax, Coupon, Gift Cards.*** Total amount** A button shown at the bottom of this screen depending on how the staff open this one:*** If the staff starts with Scan Order button at Home screen, after scanning QR code of the customer’s order, the button shown at the bottom named “Confirm“. On tapping this button, show success screen to inform the order completed. (refer to the ticket [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KP-858|smart-link])*** If the staff starts with Orders button at Home screen, firstly they open Order List screen, on tapping any orders it’ll open Order Detail screen, the button shown at the bottom named “Scan Order“. On tapping this button, it’ll show the scan screen (camera), the order will be completed immediately after being scanned.+Validation rules:+* Customer’s avatar must be synced up with the one on consumer apps.** Customer changes avatar, it’ll changed, too.** Customer does not upload avatar, show the default one (two-first characters)* The customer name should be fully displayed on this screen.* Phone number must match to the one on consumer apps.* Update status:** When order status is New. I can only update to Preparing.** When order status is Preparing. I can only update to Ready.** When order status is Ready. There’s 2 options of status for me to update:*** I can update to Completed. (for Pickup orders) by scanning QR code.*** I can update to Shipping (only for Delivery orders).** When the status is Shipping (only for Delivery orders). I can update to Completed by scanning QR code.** Finally, when order status is Completed. I cannot update any status anymore.* Payment Status:** Paid: for the orders created by customers on their apps or created by the staff directly at store.** Unpaid: not available in the sprint of S2036* The list of order items: all information must match to the one on consumer app or KardPOS app.* Scan Order button:** This button is enabled when the order type is pick-up and order status is Ready.** Or this button is enabled when the order type is delivery and order status is Shipping.

title: Order Process App - Order List
description: As a staff of the store, I want to view all the orders created from consumer apps, so that I can review and deliver the orders to customers.+*AC:*+* After login to Order Process App, I can see a button named “Orders”.* On “Orders” button, I can see the number displayed on the icon, which shows new orders created from consumer apps or KardPOS app. This number represents for the number of processing orders, and it is displayed all the time. If there is any order status turning Completed, this number goes down correspondingly. The maximum number is 100, if there are more than 100 processing orders, show “99+”.* When tapping Orders button, the new screen (“Order List”) opened.* On Order List screen:** I can see all the orders having been created by customers on their apps or by other staffs on KardPOS app.** I can search orders by Customer Name, Phone Number. Search field is fixed at the top of screen, I can slide from orders list.** I want to see the filter icon at the top-right of screen so that I can filter the list of orders. On clicking Filter icon, show the bottom sheet filter:*** Status (All / New / Preparing / Ready / Shipping / Completed). The default value is All.*** Type (All / Pickup / Delivery). The default value is All.*** Date range: this range should last for a latest week from the current date. (Ex: 09/15/2020 - 09/21/2020).*** Cancel button: close the filter.*** Clear Filter button: clear all filter set and return the original status.*** Filter icon should be highlighted when I’m using filter. If not applying filter or clearing filter, the color icon returns normal.** For each order shown on the list:*** I can see the customer name, phone number, order number, order status, delivery/pickup address, delivery/pickup time (both date and time here).*** I can tap any orders to view Order Detail list. (refer ticket KP-721)+Validation rules:+* The list of orders is sorted by created date from the top downwards.* Search orders:** Customer Name: I can search with first name / last name / the phrase contained in the name and search with no case-sensitive.** Phone Number: I can search with full phone number or the string of number contained in the phone number.** If no orders found, I want to see the message “No orders found.“. This message shown directly on the screen and center-aligned.* Date: Follow this format MM/DD/YYYY (Ex: 04/21/2020 - 09/21/2020). * For each order shown on the list:** All the information displayed on the order must match to the one on consumer apps / KardPOS app.** Customer’s name and phone number must match to the order info when customer makes the order. There info would be fixed for each order.** If the customer name is long, use ellipsis, make sure the name only shown in a line.** {color:#ff5630}*_If the order created by user with Pay Now option chosen and the order created from KardPOS by order creation feature, they’ll not be shown on the list._*{color}XD: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/226754e7-506a-4931-9c66-10744615b33e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/29f97e9e-5996-44e9-b4d1-b0600884bc8e-7caa/screen/226754e7-506a-4931-9c66-10744615b33e/]Git: KardSys\\KardPICKUP\\05-Export\\Sprint-2036\\KP-708 Kard Order Process.xd

title: Web Apps - Delivery Options - Delivery Address - Get User's Address as Default Value
description: As a customer I want to see my address in Delivery Address by default when I select Delivery for Shipping method when purchasing an order on web and mobile apps.* I don’t expect to enter delivery addressing always as the current flow. The delivery address should be populated from my default address:** Case 1: If user has verified KYC, the delivery address should be the KYC address. This address should be kept even if user changes another payment method.** Case 2: If user has not verified KYC, the delivery address will be empty, user has to input manually that one.* I can change it if that is not the address that I want to receive the order.
